description: Disaster awaits those beguiled by this crooked hickory wand.

name: Master's Wand of Phantom Bolt
description: Your illusory bolts become more ominous with this smoky amber wand.

name: Master's Wand of Ray of Frost
description: Your ray of frost accurately strikes a target hiding among its allies.

name: Master's Wand of Scorching Burst
description: Your scorching burst burns devastatingly hot at its core.

name: Master's Wand of Spiteful Glamor
description: This wand is especially deadly to creatures you haven't harmed yet.

name: Master's Wand of Thundering Armor
description: Your ally's armor rumbles with the dread power of thunder.

name: Master's Wand of Thunderwave
description: This wand grants the ability to reshape your thunderwave power.

name: Master's Wand of Vicious Mockery
description: Wielding this hackberry wand sharpens your tongue and hones your wit.

name: Matrakk's Lenses
description: Lenses of perfect crystal hone your vision and protect you from attacks that target your sight.

name: Mauling Weapon
description: This weapon excels at smashing down barriers, knocking over foes, and breaking open containers.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus against constructs and objects.

name: Maw of the Guardian
description: Engraved with the primal rune of the devourer, this weapon increases your damage while you're in a guardian form.

name: Medallion of Confounding Ideas
description: This copper amulet empowers you to lend strength to the minds of your allies, confounding enemy attacks.
augment_1:: Allies also gain resistance to psychic damage equal to 3 + the item's enhancement bonus while within the zone.

name: Medallion of Death Deferred
description: This distinctive talisman holds the icy grip of death in check.

name: Medallion of Dol Arrah
description: The light from the sun face adorning this golden medallion purifies the body and soul with the fires of heaven.
requirement:: You must worship dol arrah or the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Medallion of the Mind
description: The amethyst pupil on this medallion glows softly when your thoughts take root in the minds of those around you.

name: Medic's Amulet
description: This amulet helps healers staunch wounds.

name: Medic's Weapon
description: A divine warrior of any kind can use this weapon to bring victory in the name of his deity.

name: Melegaunt's Darkblade
description: Forged long ago in a pact with a Prince of Netheril, this blade of shimmering black glass trails shadowy tendrils as it strikes with preternatural alacrity.
critical:: +1d6 cold damage per plus, or +1d10 cold damage per plus against shadow creatures.

name: Meliorating Armor
description: This dull steel armor looks extremely well-made, but also quite simple. The more you get hit, the harder the armor gets.

name: Melora's Storm Blessing
description: Individuals who please Melora gain the ability to walk upon the air, soaring over their enemies and obstacles placed before them with ease.

info.Description: This kit includes all the items grouped beneath its entry: a grappling hook, a small hammer, and ten pitons. When you use a climber’s kit, you gain a +2 bonus to Athletics checks for climbing.

name: Mental Block
description: Exposed to mind-rupturing magic for years, you learned to block out the pain.

name: Mercurial Mind
description: Focusing your thoughts allows you to move with blurring speed to stay one step ahead of your enemies.

name: Mercurial Rod
description: You can forgo your curse to make one attack more potent when you use this rod.

name: Mercury WaspMercury Wasp Swarm
description: : Shifting dunes, obsidian islands, and nomadic tiefling bands are all that remain of the once mighty empire obliterated by devastating magic long ago. Called the Sea of Dust, few dare travel the trackless wastes because terrors beyond counting exist here, and the area’s landscape is as dangerous as the fiercest monster. For all the dangers it poses, adventurers still mount expeditions into the wastes in hopes of recovering the fabulous treasures believed to be housed in lost ruins and decimated cities. Few adventurers recover items, but the rare magic discovered is enough to draw new explorers from all over the world.               The mercury wasps were uncovered from the fabled Forgotten City. Mages deemed the items to be figurines of wondrous power since they shared the same properties as other items, but they had one distinctive quality. Rather than conjure a single creature, the figurine summoned a swarm of thumb-size black wasps that seethed and hummed with unexpected fury. Many believe these wasps speak to the character of the lost peoples destroyed long ago.

name: Mesmerizing Harp
description: This harp emits soothing tones on its own, and it can continue to play itself even after you have stopped.

name: Mighty Armory
description: Gorgeous armor and brilliant weapons are mounted on the walls of this sumptuous chamber.

name: Mighty Strike Ki Focus
description: This leather bag contains a metal plate inscribed with runes. You focus your ki and strike at the plate, shattering it to pieces that turn to smoke. The plate then reappears in the bag.

name: Mind Armor
description: At a moment's notice, you can surround this adamantine armor with a psychic field that protects you from mental attacks.

name: Mind Dust
description: Psychic attacks are deadlier when you use the powdered brain of a mind flayer.

name: Mind Hunter's Armor
description: This suit of pitted mail carries the scars of the fight against the Far Realm, and protects against effects that tear at the mind.

name: Mind-Rending Weapon
description: The blade has an unnerving purple hue that seems somehow wrong.

name: Mindcrusher Weapon
description: This weapon channels psychic energy, empowering your mental attacks to continue resonating within your foe after you strike.

name: Mindiron Vambraces
description: These smooth crystal bracers are shot through with purple veins that pulse when you attack.

name: Mindiron Weapon
description: This metal weapon projects arrows or bolts partially into the realm of the mind.

name: Mirror of Deception
description: When you stand before this wrought-iron framed mirror, you can change your looks to reflect your every whim.

name: Mirror of Opposition
description: This small, ornately framed mirror briefly reverses your opponent's loyalties.

name: Mirrored Mask
description: A jagged-cut mask of silvered glass appears to show images of eladrin scouts even as it protects you from attacks.

name: Mirrored Plate
description: This gleaming plate mail lends authority to your voice and can blind foes with its brilliance.

name: Mirrorsheen Coat
description: Magic woven into this armor makes it highly reflective and bright. It's effective against radiant energy and gaze attacks.

name: Mithral Armor
description: Mithral armor shines like polished silver. Most who use it claim it has saved them on more than one occasion.

name: Mithral Maze
description: A brilliant silvery gateway beckons the unwary.

name: Mithral Plating
description: The lightweight metal protects your vitals while still allowing you maximum flexibility and full range of motion.
requirement:: You must have the living construct racial trait to use this item.

name: Mithral Shield
description: Light reflects brightly from this highly polished, silvery shield.

name: Mithrendain Steel Weapon
description: This weapon is infused with the Feywild's inherent arcane energy.

name: Mnemonic Staff
description: The glyphs carved into this staff suggest its ability to recall mundane and magical secrets.

name: Monocle of Comprehension
description: Sharing this monocle with your friends helps them understand the efreets with whom you're dealing. You didn't tell them that wearing it was unnecessary.

name: Moon Armor
description: This armor is made from deposits of a strange ore that some believe came from the moon.

name: Moon Disk of Sehanine
description: This symbol allows its user to lower a darkening veil over an enemy, temporarily confounding the creature.
requirement:: To use this symbol, You must worship sehanine.

name: Moonbow
description: This slender bow is made of white wood so polished it looks like pearl, and its string is almost invisible. As you draw the string, a gleaming arrow of light appears, nocked and ready.

name: Moonclaw
description: The longsword's silvery blade bears runic engravings, oaths of vengeance against werebeasts and other shapechangers.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +2d12 against shapechangers.

name: Mooncloth Robes
description: A would-be attacker is shunted away from you by the protective power of these shimmering robes.

name: Moonlight Lavaliere
description: This pendant sheds a soft moonlight glow when you are attacked, dazing enemies that hit you.

name: Moonlight, First Blade of Night (Blade of Night)
description: Tiny, bright lights shine within this black metal blade. The hilt is coated in black lacquer, with a round, perfect moonstone set where hilt meets blade.          You feel a sense of smug superiority emanating from the weapon.
critical:: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn

name: Moonsilver Staff
description: This pale wood staff is topped with a moonstone sphere. It harms lycanthropes with radiant energy.

name: Moonstone Sphere
description: This perfect globe of lustrous moonstone has a dark flaw that gives it the appearance of an eyeball. At times, it moves like a roving eye, looking at something its wielder missed.

name: Moradin's Blessing of Iron
description: Moradin grants the strength of the mountain and the toughness of iron to followers who win his favor. His blessing augments both body and mind, instilling bravery and toughness in his chosen.

name: Moradin's Indestructible Anvil
description: This anvil-shaped holy symbol allows one to bestow the durability of Moradin's crafts upon a recipient.
requirement:: To use this symbol, You must worship moradin.

name: Moradin's Weapon
description: This hammer carries the weight of the earth and gives a follower of Moradin the concussive power to knock down his or her enemies.

name: Moran's Eye
description: This sphere of translucent orange crystal is 6 inches in diameter and warm to the touch. One side of the orb features a gold-flecked disk split by a vertical black slash, like a cat's eye.

info.Description: This torch never stops burning. It casts bright light to a radius of 5 squares but sheds no heat, so you can stow it in a bag or a pouch. You can’t set fire to anything with it.

name: Mordant Weapon
description: Tempered in the black blood of a mordant hydra, the etched steel of this weapon strikes with bitter fury.
weapon:: Heavy blade, light blade or  spear

name: Mordenkainen's Tome
description: This tome's cover is inscribed with a shimmering silver sword.

name: Mountain Armor
description: Dwarf armorsmiths combine the elemental earth of their mountain homes with other metals to craft this heavy armor.

name: Mountain Shield
description: Inlaid with Dwarven runes and images of mountains, this shield keeps your allies from being pulled into dangerous situations.

name: Mountainfall Ki Focus
description: A leather pouch filled with pebble shards lends you the full weight of the mountain to strike against vulnerable enemies.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you knock the target prone

name: Mrtok, Ogre Chief (Gauntlets of Ogre Power)
description: Crafted of thick plates of iron, these gauntlets are clearly very old and more than a little rusted. Designs are painted on them: a sadistic grin on one and beady eyes on the other.          These gauntlets chuckle quietly to themselves.

name: Muddling Mind
description: You pierce an enemy's mind and manipulate its senses so it perceives what you want it to perceive.

name: Muleback Harness
description: This unadorned leather harness allows you to carry and drag heavier loads.

name: Mummified Hand
description: This gnarled hand allows you to gain the benefit of a third ring.

name: Murkoorak's Orb
description: This crystalline silver gem glows when you have advantage over your foes.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if you have combat advantage

info.Description: Legend holds that Moradin made the first godplate armor, and ancient dwarf smiths copied his patterns imperfectly to make warplate armor.

name: Mystery of the Hidden Veil
description: Through misdirection and concealing magic, you obscure your spellcasting.

name: Nail of Sealing
description: This thick iron nail is adorned with warding symbols and can hold shut any portal or container.

name: Necklace of Fireballs
description: A star ruby, glowing with inner fire, hangs from an iron chain.

name: Necklace of Keys
description: Each key threaded through this leather cord necklace can unlock a portal, even one you haven't detected yet.

name: Necroshard Weapon
description: This large black gem can be placed in the hilt of a melee weapon imbuing the weapon with necrotic power.

name: Necrotic Weapon
description: The wounds inflicted by this weapon also drain an enemy's vitality.
weapon:: Axe, heavy blade or  light blade

name: Netherdark Shield
description: The black, scaly hide covering the face of the shield drinks in the light.

name: Nibenay's Cruel Reminder
description: The enigmatic Shadow King is rarely involved in the governance of Nibenay. He leaves it to his favored to ensure that no one forgets who rules the city.

name: Nightmare Thread
description: When burned, this thread, woven from a nightmare by the hand of a hag, makes you a terrifying vision in the eyes of your enemy.

name: Nightmare Tongue Dust
description: A tembo's tongue is required to make the weakest of these antihealing reagents. The tongue of a nightmare beast goes into the stronger forms of the dust.

name: Nightmare Ward Armor
description: The glistening black material of this armor, strangely cold to the touch, reliably deflects mental attacks.

name: Nightmare's Equal Footing
description: Your opponent's sight fails at your strike, putting it on the same footing as you.
augment_1:: As above, but the target is blinded (save ends).

name: Nightmare's Instinctive Adjustment
description: You let your heightened instincts guide you out of danger.
augment_1:: As above, but you shift up to 3 squares.

name: Nightmare's Keen Senses
description: Your other senses come to the fore when your vision fails you.
augment_1:: As above, and you gain combat advantage for this attack.

name: Nightmare's Unseeing Stance
description: You close your eyes and embrace the perfect darkness. Your other senses take over and guide your strikes with shocking accuracy.
augment_1:: As above, except you gain blindsight 10.

name: Nightstalker's Poniard
description: Forged of dark metal, its hilt wrapped in black leather, this slender-bladed knife seems perfect for nighttime wetwork
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +3d12 if the attack was made with combat advantage.

name: Nimble Shoes
description: With these supple shoes on your feet, you leap and climb with ease.
augment_1:: You cannot be knocked prone and you can ignore forced movement until the end of your next turn.

name: Nine Furies Totem
description: This totem is crafted of horn, wood, and sinew. It flares with power as warrior spirits invigorate your comrades in battle.

name: Nitharit Poison
description: This clear, odorless, tasteless liquid slowly turns a creature's natural defenses against poison into a harmful weapon.

info.Description: This is a finely crafted, nonmagical symbol of precious metal that characters who worship gods might carry as a representation of their deity.

name: Nonagon of Kol Korran
description: The nine-sided coin glimmers even though no light shines upon its surface.
requirement:: You must worship kol korran or the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Noxious Grenade
description: Plumes of green smoke pour from the sputtering flame, sending a rancid stench into the air.

name: Nullifying Ring
description: Formed from a metal as black as a starless night, this band counters attacks made against you.

name: Oalian's Balance Totem
description: Reflecting the balance between civilization and the wilderness, half of this totem is carved with runes, and the other half is unshaped except by nature.

name: Oathblade
description: This fine steel weapon strikes deadly blows against the foe you swear to vanquish.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against a target marked by you.

name: Obsidian SteedObsidian Steed
description: : When you activate a figurine, the conjured creature appears in a space adjacent to you, provided the space is large enough to contain the creature without squeezing. The creature obeys only you, responding to commands spoken in any language. The creature remains for up to 8 hours or until you use a minor action to dismiss it. The conjured creature acts on the same initiative count as you. Every action it takes costs you a minor action (which you use to issue commands), and a conjured creature cannot exceed its normal allotment of actions (a standard, a move, and a minor action) during its turn. If you spend no minor actions on your turn to command the creature, it remains where it is without taking any actions on its turn.          A conjured creature has hit points, defenses, and attacks as indicated in its statistics block. It has no healing surges and cannot be healed, though it can still benefit from temporary hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, the conjured creature disappears and cannot be conjured again until after you’ve taken an extended rest. Conjured creatures lack basic attacks and therefore cannot make opportunity attacks.          Mount: If the conjured creature has the mount keyword, you can ride the creature and are considered to have the Mounted Combat feat while mounted on it. While mounted, you can command the creature using free actions, though the mount is still limited to its normal allotment of actions. You can choose to be mounted on the creature when it appears.

name: Oceanstrider Boots
description: Water is no obstacle for you in these thigh-high oilskin boots.

name: Octogram of the Sovereign Host
description: The Celestial Crown of the Sovereign Host embodies the unity of the deities—a mighty force for light and good.
requirement:: You must worship the sovereign host or any deity represented by the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Ollamh Harp
description: This harp calls down the fury of the storm and grants it to all listeners.

info.Description: This magic bread fills the stomach and provides all necessary nutrients with only a few small bites, so you can carry food for a long journey without weighing yourself down.

name: Onatar's Forge
description: The crossed hammer and tongs blaze white-hot as you channel your deity's wrath.
requirement:: You must worship onatar or the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Onslaught Arrow
description: This black arrow trails a bright pennant, flagging its target.

name: Onyx DogOnyx Dog
description: : When you activate a figurine, the conjured creature appears in a space adjacent to you, provided the space is large enough to contain the creature without squeezing. The creature obeys only you, responding to commands spoken in any language. The creature remains for up to 8 hours or until you use a minor action to dismiss it. The conjured creature acts on the same initiative count as you. Every action it takes costs you a minor action (which you use to issue commands), and a conjured creature cannot exceed its normal allotment of actions (a standard, a move, and a minor action) during its turn. If you spend no minor actions on your turn to command the creature, it remains where it is without taking any actions on its turn.          A conjured creature has hit points, defenses, and attacks as indicated in its statistics block. It has no healing surges and cannot be healed, though it can still benefit from temporary hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, the conjured creature disappears and cannot be conjured again until after you’ve taken an extended rest. Conjured creatures lack basic attacks and therefore cannot make opportunity attacks.          Mount: If the conjured creature has the mount keyword, you can ride the creature and are considered to have the Mounted Combat feat while mounted on it. While mounted, you can command the creature using free actions, though the mount is still limited to its normal allotment of actions. You can choose to be mounted on the creature when it appears.

name: Opal CarpOpal Carp
description: This opal lozenge is carved with scales, and can transform into a giant fish.

name: Opal Ring of Remembrance
description: The large fire opal set into this bauble flares brightly when it bestows mental clarity.

name: Opportunistic Weapon
description: An enemy quickly regrets turning its back to the wielder of this weapon.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus with opportunity attacks.

name: Orb of Accuracy
description: Though your opponent attempts to hide, this silver-caged, crystalline orb enables you to perceive its location.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 per plus against enemies that are invisible or that have concealment or total concealment from you

name: Orb of Arcane Generosity
description: Not all wizards are selfish, power hungry curmudgeons. This orb best serves those gifted with a more generous spirit.

name: Orb of Augmented Stasis
description: When you use this orb to hold a foe in place, that foe also suffers a mental block that limits his actions.

name: Orb of Coercive Dementia
description: With the use of this orb, a spellcaster sends his enemy spiraling into confusion, depriving the creature of its most powerful attack.

name: Orb of Crimson Commitment
description: This orb glows a bright red when in use, bestowing power and luck to your attack.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus while you are bloodied.

name: Orb of Crystalline Terror
description: The screaming faces of past victims roil within this dread orb, striking fear into your enemy's heart.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus if the attack has the fear keyword.

name: Orb of Darkest Defiling
description: When you draw on life energy to power your magic, fiery veins just beneath the surface of this translucent sphere glow and pulse.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus when you use a power with arcane defiling

name: Orb of Debillitating Languor
description: This shadowy orb leaves your enemy enfeebled.

name: Orb of Distance Denial
description: Composed of numerous smaller orbs fused into one spherical mass, this orb hampers an enemy's ranged attacks.

name: Orb of Draconic Majesty
description: A winged, draconic shape dances in the orb, lending you the fearsome seeming of a dragon when you wish.

name: Orb of Dragonkind
description: This smooth crystal orb of swirling colors can grant you the power to command dragons.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against dragons.

name: Orb of Drastic Resolutions
description: A sphere of brilliant purple glass, alight with ribbons of crimson dancing beneath its smooth surface.

name: Orb of Entropy
description: The utter ruin manifest in Tharizdun’s will swirls inside this globe of purest black. When activated, the orb is shrouded in a nimbus of purple light.

name: Orb of Far Seeing
description: You capture the image of your enemy in this translucent sphere, leaving him no place to hide.

name: Orb of Fickle Fate
description: Light and shadow swirl inside this globe when you bestow the implement's boon upon an ally and its curse upon an enemy.

name: Orb of Fiery Condemnation
description: Enemies you face have a habit of exploding into fire.

name: Orb of Frustrated Recovery
description: This scarlet sphere shines with an inner light when you use it to frustrate your enemy's attempts to recover from your attack.

name: Orb of Ghostbane Triumph
description: Psionic energy clouds this darkened sphere, unfurling when you lash out at spectral foes.
augment_1:: The target loses the insubstantial quality (save ends).

name: Orb of Harmonic Agony
description: When tapped, this orb rings with a clear bass tone, combining with your thunder attacks to rattle an enemy's senses.

name: Orb of Heightened Imposition
description: This green quartz orb extends the duration of powerful spells.

name: Orb of Impenetrable Escape
description: This murky orb reflects the visage of your enemy suffering from an ongoing barrage of conditions and afflictions.

name: Orb of Indefatigable Concentration
description: The wielder of this crystalline orb can temporarily transfers a fraction of his consciousness into it, allowing him to focus his attention elsewhere.

name: Orb of Indisputable Gravity
description: A sphere of sky blue crystal.

name: Orb of Inescapable Consequences
description: With this orb in hand, your powers can have their intended effects even if your accuracy is lacking.

info.Description: Ritual casters use a ritual book to store the rituals they have mastered.

name: Orb of Inevitable Continuance
description: A sphere of gray crystal that appears as a ball of solid mist.

name: Orb of Inexplicable Contention
description: Armed with this orb, you can twist the minds of those who oppose you, causing them to turn against their allies.

name: Orb of Insurmountable Force
description: The repulsive force emanating from this orb makes it hard to grasp.

name: Orb of Invasive Fortune
description: A sphere of crystal consisting of swirls of gold and orange.

name: Orb of Judicious Conjuration
description: This orb ensures the longevity of your conjuration spells and also allows you to sustain effects more easily.

name: Orb of Karmic Resonance
description: With this orb, you steal good luck from enemies and send them ill fortune.

name: Orb of Life Conversion
description: This black orb feeds on your life force instead of your psionic reserves to augment your powers.

name: Orb of Mental Constitution
description: This rough brown stone reinforces your hardiness with your mental toughness.
augment_1:: You gain a +4 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.

name: Orb of Mental Dominion
description: A spellcaster channeling his mind through this orb gains mental prowess over foes, forcing them to relive the effects of a spell.

name: Orb of Mighty Retort
description: Your enemies suffer dire consequences for daring to attack you while you wield this orb.

info.Description: Wizards keep the spells they’ve learned in a spellbook.

name: Orb of Nimble Thoughts
description: This scarlet crystal lets you move across the battlefield at the speed of thought to avoid your foes' attacks.
augment_1:: You regain the use of this power.

name: Orb of Petrification
description: This dull gray granite orb grasps your enemies in a stony embrace.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

name: Orb of Psionic Recovery
description: This pink sphere absorbs lingering psionic energy and harnesses it for your use.

name: Orb of Psychic Conversion
description: This clear crystal orb imbues your attacks with psychic energy and channels the pain of psychic damage you take, sending it to your enemies.

name: Orb of Repeated Imposition
description: This etched turquoise orb increases the frequency of your arcane imposition.

name: Orb of Resilient Tenacity
description: The constant buzzing whisper that issues from this amethyst orb reinforces your will.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you or an ally within 5 squares of you gains a power bonus to saving throws equal to the enhancement bonus of the orb against one effect until that effect ends.

name: Orb of Revenant Magic
description: To the wielder of this orb, failure is not a concern.

name: Orb of Reversed Polarities
description: A sphere of polished crystal that appears as a ball of stormy sky.

name: Orb of Sanguinary Repercussions
description: This sphere of brilliant crimson hastens injured enemies to their doom.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus or +1d10 damage per plus against bloodied creatures

name: Orb of Spatial Contortion
description: The crystal shell of this orb refracts your spell energy, scattering it in different directions.

name: Orb of Stored Energy
description: This glittering sphere stores psionic energy that you can unleash when your own power has waned.

name: Orb of Sudden Insanity
description: This orb holds a grip on your enemy's sanity, forcing him to act in uncharacteristic ways.

name: Orb of Supplementary Force
description: This sphere of scarlet glass pulses with barely controlled energy.
critical:: +1d6 force damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone.

name: Orb of Sweet Sanctuary
description: The silvery sheen of this orb grows to surround you at your will, warding off danger.

name: Orb of Temporal Dissonance
description: You can cause a hiccup in time to give your allies a tactical advantage.

name: Orb of Translocation Interference
description: This insubstantial orb taps into the space between the planes, altering the course of teleportation.

name: Orb of Ultimate Imposition
description: The will of this orb's wielder imposes great force on an enemy, crippling his power.

name: Orb of Unfailing Concentration
description: This oval orb helps you maintain your concentration, absorbing any psionic energy that escapes when your focus is broken.

name: Orb of Unintended Solitude
description: Gazing into this dark sphere hints at the nature of the mysterious location into which its victims are cast.

name: Orb of Unlucky Exchanges
description: This orb offers relief to an ally and unleashes terrible retribution upon an enemy.

info.Description: To use the Thievery skill properly, you need the right picks and pries, skeleton keys, clamps, and so on. Thieves’ tools grant a +2 bonus to Thievery checks to open a lock or to disable a trap.

name: Orb of Unstoppable Decline
description: You can use this purple crystal sphere to capture your foe's image and subject it to a psychic assault when it unsuccessfully tries to shrug off harmful effects.
augment_2:: The psychic damage equals 1d10 + this orb's enhancement bonus.

name: Orb of Visionary Protection
description: This translucent orb swirls with potential futures, each waiting for you to grasp and bend it to your will.

name: Orb of Weakness Intensified
description: Swirling with purple energy, this orb laces a spell with a crippling effect that debilitates your foe.

name: Orb of the Canny Liar
description: This smoky gray orb enhances your ability to bluff, making your foe more vulnerable to sudden attacks.
augment_2:: The enemy is also dazed until the end of your next turn.

name: Orb of the Deft Negotiator
description: This pale white stone emits feelings of calm and goodwill, making your enemies willing to attack those you choose.
augment_2:: The enemy gains a power bonus to the attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

name: Orb of the Furtive Mind
description: You can use this black crystal to conceal yourself after an attack.
augment_1:: You are invisible to all enemies until the end of your next turn.

name: Orb of the Menacing Impulse
description: This red stone transmits feelings of uneasiness to your enemy, forcing it to flee from you.

name: Orb of the Peerless Artist
description: This blue stone lets you shape psionic magic as you wish.
augment_2:: (Psychic): On a hit, a target takes 2 extra psychic damage for each square excluded.

name: Orb of the Planes
description: This multicolored orb provides knowledge of the planes and allows its user to thwart those who frequently travel through the planes.

name: Orb of the Sympathetic Eye
description: This crystal orb, which changes color to fit the moods of those around you, lets you transmit your enemy's pain to another foe.

info.Description: Leather armor is sturdier than cloth armor. It protects vital areas with multiple layers of boiled-leather plates, while covering the limbs with supple leather that provides a small amount of protection.        Magic appears at higher item levels, and grants higher armor bonuses than its mundane counterparts. Leather armor grants +3 AC at levels 16-25, and +4 AC at levels 26-30.
Legend holds that Moradin made the first godplate armor, and ancient dwarf smiths copied his patterns imperfectly to make warplate armor.
A torch is a wooden rod capped with twisted flax soaked in tallow. A torch burns for one hour and provides bright light to a radius of 5 squares.

name: Orb of the Usurper
description: Thanks to this orb, what at first was an attack on a foe's mind becomes a crushing grip upon the foe's freedom of will.

name: Orc's-Eye Amulet
description: This amulet, consisting of a magic eye within a cloth pouch, has the power to fortify you.

name: Orium Implement
description: The glyphs carved into this staff suggest its ability to recall mundane and magical secrets.
requirement:: Orb, Rod, Staff, Wand

name: Ornament of Alertness
description: This small amulet or token is etched with an eye and sharpens your senses.

name: Overreaching Weapon
description: This polearm extends as you strike at distant enemies, putting them within your range.

name: Pact Blade
description: Warlocks favor this wickedly sharp blade.

name: Pact Blade - Raiment of Shadows
description: Warlocks favor this wickedly sharp blade.

name: Pact Blade - Zy Tormtor's Trinkets
description: Warlocks favor this wickedly sharp blade.

name: Pact Bow
description: Crafted from a tree deep within the Feywild, this bow is a conduit for warlock powers.

name: Pact Hammer
description: This dark steel hammer is the prized possession of any dwarven warlock who wishes to wield weapon and magic with equal effectiveness.

name: Pact Sword
description: Eladrin warlocks favor these sinister longswords for their ability to combine weapon and magic and for the power to control an enemy's position.

name: Paired Weapon
description: One weapon suddenly becomes two with startling speed.

name: Panther Slippers
description: These soft, clawed shoes help you stay within striking range of your prey.

name: Panther Spirit Armor
description: Crafted of supple leather from a noble panther's hide, this armor is imbued with the panther spirit's power and resilience.

name: Panther Tears
description: For a moment your vision is blurry, but when you blink away the excess liquid, you see clearly through the gloom.

name: Panther Totem
description: Carved in the shape of a panther and adorned with fangs, this totem grants its user feline stealth.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target granting combat advantage to you

name: Paralyzing Weapon
description: This crossbow is enameled with stylized images of poisonous snakes. The bolts it fires drip with toxic venom.

name: Parchment Armor
description: This armor is made of magically reinforced parchment inscribed with arcane writings.

name: Parry Gauntlets
description: With these thickly armored gauntlets, you are more secure when you take a breather.

name: Parrying Weapon
description: A wielder of this weapon never truly lowers his or her defenses.

name: Pavise Charm
description: This shield-shaped charm surrounds you with protective energy.

name: Peacemaker's Periapt
description: Carved from alabaster and shaped into the stylized likeness of a dove, this amulet enhances your charm.

name: Pearl Sea HorsePearl Sea Horse
description: : When you activate a figurine, the conjured creature appears in a space adjacent to you, provided the space is large enough to contain the creature without squeezing. The creature obeys only you, responding to commands spoken in any language. The creature remains for up to 8 hours or until you use a minor action to dismiss it. The conjured creature acts on the same initiative count as you. Every action it takes costs you a minor action (which you use to issue commands), and a conjured creature cannot exceed its normal allotment of actions (a standard, a move, and a minor action) during its turn. If you spend no minor actions on your turn to command the creature, it remains where it is without taking any actions on its turn.          A conjured creature has hit points, defenses, and attacks as indicated in its statistics block. It has no healing surges and cannot be healed, though it can still benefit from temporary hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, the conjured creature disappears and cannot be conjured again until after you’ve taken an extended rest. Conjured creatures lack basic attacks and therefore cannot make opportunity attacks.          Mount: If the conjured creature has the mount keyword, you can ride the creature and are considered to have the Mounted Combat feat while mounted on it. While mounted, you can command the creature using free actions, though the mount is still limited to its normal allotment of actions. You can choose to be mounted on the creature when it appears.

name: Pelaurum Armor
description: A blessing from Pelor makes golden armor surprisingly sturdy.

name: Pelaurum Shield
description: With this sparkling copper shield, the intense energy of an errant blast fuels your power when you next strike.

name: Pelor's Scepter
description: This golden rod is capped with a sunburst that adds potency to your radiant powers.

name: Pelor's Sun Blessing
description: The undimmed light of Pelor shines from individuals who champion his cause. They drive evil before them and bring solace to companions who fight alongside them.

name: Penance Armor
description: Intricate runes of rebuke are scribed into this armor's links, promising divine punishment for those that dare harm you.

name: Periapt of Cascading Health
description: Adventurers feel a little more confident fighting dragons with this bauble in their possession.

name: Periapt of Proof against Poison
description: The black gem on this thin silver chain turns white when you're exposed to poison.

name: Periapt of Recovery
description: Ward off death's grasp with this small pendant.

name: Periapt of Wisdom
description: This silver amulet increases your wisdom and can be activated to greatly enhance the strength of your will.

name: Periapt of Wound Closure
description: When you suffer a grievous wound, this gem releases a burst of stored vitality, helping your body quickly heal itself.

name: Perpetual Resolve Vestments
description: The divine power in these vestments shields you from ongoing damage.

name: Phantom Bridle
description: Placing this bridle on your phantom steed makes it nearly impervious to damage.

name: Phantom Chaussures
description: With your lower legs bound in gossamer silk, you become ephemeral, and sometimes invisible.

name: Phantom Soldier
description: This tiny figurine is carved in the shape of a warrior and can be used summon a life-sized illusion of the depicted warrior to distract your enemies in battle.

name: Phasing Arrow
description: Ephemeral in flight, this arrow strikes its target solidly

name: Phasing Weapon
description: This weapon's projectiles phase in and out of reality when fired, slipping through cover as if it weren't there.

name: Philosopher's Crown
description: This intricate golden crown ensures that the breadth of your knowledge is unparalleled.

name: Phoenix Helm
description: This helm, carved to resemble a phoenix, increases your perception and can be activated to improve a ranged attack.

name: Phoenix Sash
description: This brilliant orange wrap restores life to the vanquished.

name: Phrenic Armor
description: When your mind is targeted, this armor lashes your foes with a pulse of psychic energy.
augment_1:: The size of the burst increases to 2.

name: Phrenic Crown
description: This pink coral coronet is eerily reminiscent of brain matter, yet is still bewitching.

name: Phylactery of Divinity
description: This leather casing is strapped to the head and focuses your faith and healing powers.

name: Piecemeal Armor
description: This armor, assembled from pieces of chain or scale, falsely seems to emphasize style over protection.

info.Description: One night's stay in a typical inn's common room

name: Pierced Heart Tattoo
description: Arrows, spears, swords—anything with a point serves to pincushion the heart at the center of this tattoo of heart.

name: Piercing Songblade
description: Silent until it lands a crucial blow, this blade sends forth a piercing note that rends your target's armor.

name: Piercing Weapon
description: This point of this spear extends, digs deep into an enemy's flesh, and leaves a weeping wound.

name: Pincer Shield
description: This shield extends its protection from you to your flanking ally.

name: Pinning Weapon
description: You use this weapon to root your enemy to the spot.

name: Piwafwi
description: A long cloak of woven spidersilk sparkles in the moonlight.

name: Plague of the Dragon's Altar
description: Standing so close to the site of powerful defiling magic may have temporarily sickened you, but it has left far worse a mark on you than that. You carry the memory of the Dragon's defiling like a plague and can unleash it upon your foes.

name: Planar Stasis Boots
description: These supple boots make you feel confident of your ability to stay in one place when confronting magical attacks that displace you.

name: Planesplitter Weapon
description: The edge of this weapon is so sharp that it seems to cut through the unseen forces separating the planes.

name: Planestrider Boots
description: These boots allow you to teleport around corners and to places you might not see from your current point of view.

info.Description: One night's stay in a typical inn's best room.

name: Point Blank Weapon
description: The wielder of this weapon need not fear wading into melee.

name: Poison Gloves
description: You can store a nasty surprise in these plain-looking gloves to envenom a weapon at a moment's notice.

name: Poisoned Weapon
description: This weapon leaves a debilitating poison that saps an enemy's vitality and strength.
weapon:: Bow, crossbow, light blade, pick or  spear

name: Polyglot Gem
description: This intricately carved gemstone holds the secrets of language within its many facets.

name: Portable Hole
description: This handkerchief-sized black circle becomes a great hole when placed on a flat surface.

name: Portal Rod
description: By holding this rune-carved rod on both sides of the portal, you stabilize the link between the two places.

name: Possum Amulet
description: When you're deeply wounded, this amulet stems the flow of blood to prevent you from dying.

name: Potion Bandolier
description: This wide brown leather baldric keeps potions in easy reach.

name: Potion of Clarity
description: This cool draught hones your physical and mental acuity at a critical moment, allowing you to strike true.

name: Potion of Eladrin Shape
description: A crystal vial contains a milky green liquid that smells simultaneously of hot iron and pine forest. The sharp tang of its flavor leads to the power to take on another form.

name: Potion of Elven Fleetness
description: Smelling of red fruit and tasting somewhat alcoholic, this wine-like potion offers its drinker the power to move easily in difficult terrain.

name: Potion of Friendship
description: This lucid pink liquid smells of roses and bubbles lightly when uncorked. One sip, and you trust the person who first meets your eye.

name: Potion of Healing
description: This simple potion draws on the body's natural healing ability to cure your wounds.

name: Potion of Life
description: This fabled potion not only heals wounds but can even bring back the recently deceased.

name: Potion of Lifeshield
description: This lemony potion shields you from necrotic energy.

name: Potion of Mimicry
description: This bitter orange liquid has the consistency of honey and allows you to adopt an instant disguise.

name: Potion of Recovery
description: This mighty potion uses your own stamina to restore your hit points and to help you shrug off harm.

name: Potion of Regeneration
description: The most grievous wounds trigger this potion’s remarkable restorative power.

name: Potion of Resistance
description: The color and smell of this potion varies with the protection it provides.

name: Potion of Spirit
description: This lavender-scented potion helps keep the spirit alive within you.

name: Potion of Stormshield
description: Your skin takes on a metallic sheen when you consume this slate gray, ozone-smelling drink.

name: Potion of Vigor
description: This vermilion liquid invigorates you, at least temporarily.

name: Potion of Vitality
description: This potent curative heals wounds and can even fix other ailments.

name: Potion of Water Walking
description: A tiny clay pot holds within it a malodorous glop, which, if choked down in one swallow, grants the consumer the power to walk over water.

name: Pouch of Frozen Passage
description: This pouch periodically renews a flurry of ice crystals that can freeze any liquid surface.

name: Pouch of Ghost-Grounding Dust
description: This pouch never runs low on ghost-grounding dust.

name: Pouch of Platinum
description: This platinum-embossed leather pouch can convert gems and coins into platinum pieces.

name: Pouches of Shared Acquisition
description: These matched leather pouches allow you to move items between them.

name: Pouncing Armor
description: The spirit of a predatory animal is bound to this armor, imbuing the wearer with powerful legs.

name: Pouncing Beast Armor
description: When you wear this armor, you can feel the beast spirit within you urging you to leap forward and attack.

info.Description: A cart's weight is 2,000 lb.

name: Power Jewel
description: Magical energy pulses within this stunning red jewel, allowing you to use a power you have already expended.
special:: You must have reached at least one milestone today to activate this item.

name: Precise Wand of Color Spray
description: Wielding this wand, you display deadly accuracy with color spray.

name: Precise Wand of Runic Resistance
description: You are deadly accurate with your runic resistance spell.

name: Precise Wand of Shock Sphere
description: Wielding this wand, you display deadly accuracy with the shock sphere spell.

name: Predator Armor
description: When you change into beast form, the primal spirit within this armor grants you the power to bring down an escaping foe.

name: Predator's Hide
description: This tiger's hide clearly marks you as a formidable hunter.

name: Predatory Weapon
description: This weapon silently urges its wielder to hunt new prey even before finishing off his or her present foe.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus if you have marked the target.

name: Premonition Ring
description: With this dark obsidian ring on your finger, you act quickly when faced with danger.

name: Preservation Shield
description: This light wood shield displays an insignia of two crossed arrows, one fletched green and the other red.

name: Primal Element
description: Creatures not of this world suffer the sting of this primal essence.

info.Description: Githzerai weavers first taught other peoples the methods of making githweave. It’s clear that the githzerai took these techniques from their erstwhile masters, the mind flayers.
A Wagon's weight is 2000 lb.

name: Prime Shot Weapon
description: This weapon demands a wily and cunning wielder who darts from cover to cover while sniping at enemies.

name: Primeval Vigor
description: The vitality of the creatures massacred during the Cleansing Wars flows through you as your draw on primal energy to transform your body.

name: Primordial Ring
description: This ring consists of twisted metal bands whose colors shift before your eyes.

name: Prismatic Robe
description: Varied dull hues entwine across this robe, springing to vibrant life to dazzle onlookers when you're attacked.

name: Propellant Boots
description: These boots contain a self-replenishing alchemical fuel that launches you through the air.

name: Psalter of Aureon
description: The open book depicted by your symbol reveals the world's secrets to you.
requirement:: You must worship aureon or the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Psychic's Ring
description: This crystalline ring glitters with psionic energy, allowing you to communicate telepathically.

name: Psychokinetic Weapon
description: A single thought sends this weapon leaping from your hand to strike a distant foe.

name: Psyweave Cloak
description: This supple cloak feels cool to the touch, and can turn back attacks with the strength of the strongest armor.
augment_1:: Increase the resistance by 5.

info.Description: A Rowboat's weight is 600 lb.

name: Pure Spirit Totem
description: Interwoven vines carved on this totem symbolize the primal magic of healing and growth held within it.

name: Purple Dragon Commander's Ring
description: This silver ring is engraved with the Purple Dragon signet of the Obarskyr royal family.

name: Pursuer's Boots
description: The magic of these fine leather boots sharpens your reflexes and lets you stay close to a fleeing foe.

name: Queen's Staff
description: Your lightning attacks and arcane defenses are more potent while you wield this staff.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and if the attack gives you a bonus to AC from your Chaos Burst class feature, that bonus increases to +3.

name: Quenchquiver Weapon
description: Strung with a flowing filament of water, this weapon arms itself with arrows of fluid that can bowl over foes with soaking shots.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against fire creatures

name: Quick Strike Ki Focus
description: This long rope coils around your hands and feet, teaching you to strike with foot and hand as one.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you shift 1 square

name: Quick Weapon
description: You can use this weapon to attack with preternatural speed.

name: Quick-Step Tattoo
description: Cheetahs, panthers, and other fast predators serve well for these tattoos.

name: Quickcurse Rod
description: With this rod, you can curse any creature you can see, and more quickly than usual.

name: Quickening Diadem
description: A diadem of astral diamonds floats about your head, honing your mental clarity and your reflexes.

info.Description: A Sailing ship's weight is 300,000 lb.

name: Quickening Staff
description: The witches of the White Spire were known for their ability to combine different forms of magic using staffs like this one.

name: Quickening Waters
description: The fey spring that feeds the gleaming Sehalandria River, which rushes from the Feywild to the world, grants preternatural speed to anyone who drinks from it.

name: Quickhit Braces
description: Favored by rangers and other two-weapon warriors, these arm guards grant the speed to strike harder and more quickly.

name: Quickling Boots
description: Your feet step more lively in this silver-stitched footgear.

name: Quicksilver Armor
description: With chain links that have the consistency of cloth but the strength of steel, this silvery armor won't weigh you down.

name: Quicksilver Blade
description: This weapon seems to move too quickly to be seen, and it imparts that ability to you.

name: Quickstride Boots
description: Soft, supple boots of blue leather add spring to your step.

name: Radiant Temple Uniform
description: This muted gray uniform protects you from watchful eyes and lets you skillfully slip past your foes in combat.

name: Radiant Weapon
description: This weapon burns with glowing, radiant energy.

name: Rageblood Armor
description: This armor was crafted from the hide of a ferocious behemoth. That creature's blood rage now enhances your own fury.

name: Rager's Belt
description: This double-thick leather and scale belt might literally be the only thing holding your guts together.

name: Raider's Crossbow
description: This compact crossbow is light and easy to handle.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus during a surprise round.

name: Rain of Hammers Ki Focus
description: This small, wooden box holds a pair of leaden hammers and a tiny drum. By beating the hammers against the drum, you sharpen your ki, accustoming your arms to deliver a steady stream of powerful attacks.

name: Rampaging Slayer's Gloves
description: Woven from the fur and interlocking claws and teeth of great predators, these nasty-looking gloves snarl and shift around your hands when you fly into your rampage.

name: Rapidstrike Bracers
description: Wearing these bracers, even your most basic attacks can quickly become dangerous.

name: Rat Form Armor
description: Tiny, sleek skins seem to make up this coat of leather, which has tassels that look disturbingly like rodent tails. With it, you can take the stealthy shape of a rat.

name: Rat Killer's Coat
description: This fur-trimmed jacket is favored by all who must deal with dangerous vermin.

name: Raven Cloak
description: Emblazoned with the symbol of the Raven Queen, this cloak protects you from the dead of winter and death.

name: Ravenclaw Warblade
description: This sword becomes more powerful when its wielder or his enemies are at death's door.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you’re bloodied

info.Description: Valuable components must be expended to perform a ritual. Typically these are small vials full of powdered metals, rare earths, acids, salts, or extracts from creatures such as dragons or basilisks.

name: Razor Armor
description: Jutting spikes and sharp edges cover each scale set into this armor.

name: Razor Bracers
description: These steel arm plates are lined with sharp edges that make grappling enemies pay dearly.

name: Razor Shield
description: Ringed in blades, this round shield is as much a weapon as an item of defense.

name: Razor Talon Totem
description: Festooned with talons, claws, and fangs, this totem makes your attacks in beast form more dangerous.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus while you are in beast form

name: Razordark Bracers
description: Lashed with lines of glass-sharp shadow, these bracers allow you to strike at range without letting your guard down.

name: Reading Spectacles
description: Your vision blurs the first time you put on these spectacles, then all written text comes into perfect focus and clarity.

name: Reality Cord
description: First crafted by the gith races, this waistband roots you in a reality that doesn't recognize the place of aberrant creatures.

name: Reaper's Axe
description: Sporting a wickedly curved blade, this steel axe draws on the death throes of your opponents to fuel its attack.

name: Reaper's Helm
description: Badly wounded foes can't elude your attacks while you wear this battle-scarred steel helmet.

info.Description: Valuable components must be expended to perform a ritual. Restoration rituals use mystic salves, dabbed or painted on the creatures to be healed. These salves come in small jars and include blessed oils and unguents made from rare spices.

name: Rebounding Weapon
description: You meant to do that. No, really.

name: Rebuking Armor
description: This silver chainmail glimmers as the divine magic within it bolsters your defenses against a foe that feels your wrath.

name: Rebuking Bracers
description: These gem-studded bracers flare with blue light as your devastating attack sends an enemy away from you.

name: Recalling Harness
description: Leather straps sewn with silver thread call your companion to you when you are in need.

name: Reckless Weapon
description: Some fighters favor force over accuracy—this weapon is for them.

name: Recoil Shield
description: This unassuming shield takes on surprising heft when you want to knock a foe flat.

name: Red Orb of Dragonkind
description: This crystalline sphere swirls with color as if filled with roiling magma. It has the power to control red dragons.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against red dragons

name: Reflective Shield
description: A nasty surprise awaits those who make attacks against you while you wear this mirrorlike shield.

name: Reflexive Armor
description: This armor protects less dextrous wearers from the brunt of attacks that generally ignore armor.

name: Reflexive Psychic Shroud
description: Through your run-ins with horrors such as cilopses and dagorrans, you have developed an innate psychic shield that masks your presence.

info.Description: Valuable components must be expended to perform a ritual. Rare herbs are usually collected and preserved during certain times of year, such as when the moon is full.

name: Regis's Ruby Pendant
description: This large, glittering pear-shaped ruby hangs from a heavy gold chain.

name: Reinforcement Tattoo
description: Kobolds, rabbits, and other quick-breeding creatures are shown in this tattoo.

name: Reinforcing Armor
description: This armor protects you even when you aren't cautious enough to protect yourself.

name: Reinforcing Belt
description: This sturdy belt offers magical protection when you need it most.

name: Relentless Spirit
description: Fueled by the pain of your wounds, primal spirits push you to greater efforts.

name: Relentless Weapon
description: The weapon thrums in your hands, as if eager to see battle.
critical:: 1d6 damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone.

name: Reliable Staff
description: No power is wasted with this sturdy oak staff in your hands.

name: Rending Weapon
description: When this axe scores a devastating strike, you can continue your assault.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and make a melee basic attack with this weapon against the same target.

name: Reparation Apparatus
description: This gauntlet-like contraption enhances your ability repair constructs.

name: Reproachful weapon
description: A strike from this weapon renders your enemy less able to respond.

info.Description: Valuable components must be expended to perform a ritual. Sanctified incense is prepared during certain religious rites and is burned as a powder or a stick.

name: Repulsion Armor
description: Inlaid with esoteric runes, this armor can repel even the most persistent foes.

name: Resilience Amulet
description: A platinum disk overlaid with a crystalline star, this amulet repels lasting injuries.

name: Resolute Armor
description: This sturdy looking armor is covered with granite slabs fused with pulsing Khyber shards.

name: Resolve of the Inner Vault
description: Your loyalty to your comrades is indomitable.

name: Resonance Crystal
description: The crystal amplifies noise until it becomes unbearable to all in its proximity.

name: Resounding Weapon
description: A thundering peal sounds when this weapon hits, dazing its target.
weapon:: Hammer, flail, mace, sling or  staff

name: Resplendent Boots
description: These intricately embroidered boots let you fade from sight for a moment to slip past your foes.

name: Resplendent Circlet
description: This gold and mithral circlet masks your thoughts and grants an ally favor in combat.

name: Resplendent Cloak
description: This richly colored cloak shields you and your allies from powers that affect the mind.

name: Resplendent Gloves
description: These fine calfskin gloves increase the potency of powers that break a foe's will.

info.Description: The concentrated magical substance that results from performing the Disenchant Magic Item ritual, residuum can be used as a component for any ritual. You can’t usually buy it on the open market; you acquire it by draining it out of magic items.

name: Restful Bedroll
description: A good long rest in this magic bedroll grants you extra vigor.

name: Restorative Gauntlets
description: These black leather gloves flare with crimson flames, their potent energy allowing an ally to return to fighting form.

name: Resurgence Tattoo
description: Creatures that return from defeat, such as the phoenix, are popular images for this tattoo.

name: Retribution Weapon
description: This blade bestows power to those who seek vengeance against an adversary.

name: Retributive Bow
description: If you come under attack, this rune-inscribed bow speeds you to safety and looses painful retribution.

name: Retributive Weapon
description: Spirits of mighty warriors bound to this weapon become enraged when you're attacked, adding their strength to your attack to knock an enemy away.

name: Revenant Ankh
description: This powerful ankh temporarily imbues an ally with life force, allowing him to return to battle.

name: Rhino Bracers
description: These gray leather bracers let you charge with the strength of a great beast, using more powerful attacks than you ordinarily could.

name: Rhythm Blade
description: Fighting with this off-hand weapon improves your defense.

name: Rhythmic War Drums
description: Reindeer hide stretches across the ornate drum of horn and wood. Those listening to its beat gain steadiness of body and fleetness of feet.

info.Description: Arrows are used up when you fire them from a projectile weapon.

name: Ribbon of Limitless Questions
description: When this blue, silky ribbon is unrolled, a new question appears on it in glowing gold and silver runes.

name: Ricochet Shield
description: The strange, seemingly arbitrary angles of this shield take on a sinister purpose when you redirect a foe's ranged attack.

name: Ricochet Weapon
description: When you fire a stone from this sling, it bounces off the target to hit another.

name: Riding Boots
description: These stylish knee-high boots let you look good while they spur your steed.

name: Righteous Armor
description: Infused with its creator's righteous conviction, this armor punishes enemies who don't fight fair.

name: Righteous Weapon
description: Crafted with faith and wrath, this weapon is a scourge of evil.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against evil creatures.

name: Rimewrought Armor
description: Fashioned from blue-tinted steel, this armor is cool to the touch.

name: Ring of Action Reversal
description: This golden band holds a small diamond hourglass, which inverts each time the ring is used.

name: Ring of Adaptation
description: This silvery metal loop is engraved with Primordial runes, protecting you from elemental effects.

name: Ring of Agile Thought
description: While you wear this ring, your thoughts seem clearer, and you recover from mental attacks quickly.

info.Description: Patterns taken from captured mind flayer garments led to mindweave armor.
Crossbow bolts are used up when you fire them from a projectile weapon.

name: Ring of Aquatic Ability
description: While you wear this aquamarine jeweled band, breathing and moving underwater comes as naturally to you as breathing air and walking on land.

name: Ring of Arcane Information
description: This ring helps you discern the nature of arcane phenomena.

name: Ring of Battlements
description: This steel band is carved to suggest crenellations—a sign of its protective magic.

name: Ring of Brotherhood
description: These platinum rings come in pairs and are shared only by the closest companions.

name: Ring of Calling
description: This mithral ring brings you and your allies closer together in times of need.

name: Ring of Circling Fangs
description: This slim, silver ring is engraved with a simple circle.

name: Ring of Dimensional Escape
description: You might escape death, but only if you have friends nearby.

name: Ring of Draconic Zeal
description: This platinum ring gleams with crimson light.

name: Ring of Dragons
description: This simple brass ring looks like a dragon circling to bite its own tail.

name: Ring of Dread
description: This rough iron ring heightens your enemies' fears and weakens their defenses.

info.Description: A rectangular magazine that attaches to the top of a repeating crossbow. A double-action lever drops a bolt into place as a free action, then fires it as a standard action. A magazine holds 10 bolts. It takes a standard action to remove an empty magazine and load a new one.

name: Ring of Eladrin Grace
description: The silver and gold weave of this grace ring recalls the heraldry of the Spiral Tower.

name: Ring of Elemental Mastery
description: Forged from elemental air, earth, fire, and water, this ring gives its wearer the durability to withstand the harshest climates and to bypass the toughest resistances.

name: Ring of Enduring Earth
description: While you wear this ring, your hand takes on the appearance of stone, signifying that you possess the durability of earth.

name: Ring of Fearlessness
description: This thin ivory band wards your mind from fear.

name: Ring of Feather Fall
description: With this airy mithral filigree band, you and sometimes your allies need not fear a fall even from the highest cliff.

name: Ring of Fey Travel
description: Wearing this shimmering feywood ring, you move with otherworldly speed, seemingly out of phase at times.

name: Ring of Fireblazing
description: Fire springs from the hand that bears this red steel ring.

name: Ring of Flight
description: This delicate silver ring bears a feathery pattern.

name: Ring of Focus
description: This ornate platinum and gold band is dotted with seven different gems.

name: Ring of Forgetful Touch
description: This unassuming copper band makes your words more convincing, and even temporarily erases the memory of an unwitting target.

info.Description: Sling bullets are used up when you fire them from a projectile weapon.

name: Ring of Free Time
description: You slip the bonds of time while you wear this simple silver band, allowing you to act faster than your foes.

name: Ring of Fury
description: This ring gleams with hate.

name: Ring of Giants
description: Your limbs are infused with the strength of a creature much larger than yourself.

name: Ring of Guarded Will
description: This band is made of sculpted force. It occasionally hums faintly in your mind.

name: Ring of Heroic Health
description: This heavy gold ring is set with a large amethyst, which shimmers faintly with healing magic.

name: Ring of Heroic Insight
description: While wearing this scored adamantine trinket, you more easily notice weaknesses—mental, physical, or social.

name: Ring of Hrumdar's Halls
description: This solid iron band grants you insight into the hazards of the underground and lets you drive your foes before you.

name: Ring of Influence
description: This ornate white gold and sapphire ring grants you sway over the minds of others.

name: Ring of Invigoration
description: This dull iron ring is engraved with what appear to be a dire bear's paw print.

info.Initiative: date (2/8/2010)        In the spider’s combined attack power, replace “at-will” with “encounter.” In addition, add the following line to the end of the power’s text. “If the claw attack hits, instead of its normal effect, the attack deals ongoing 10 poison damage (save ends).” This change limits the power of this trait when used by player characters.

name: Ring of Invisibility
description: This simple golden ring bears Rellanic script etched lightly across its surface.

name: Ring of Khirad
description: This ring is set with a clouded astral diamond whose gleam reveals things seen and unseen.

name: Ring of Life
description: A band of warm, green wood, this bark-covered ring infuses you with vitality.

name: Ring of Many Forms
description: This ring appears as a band of shifting energy, sharpening your combat prowess when you wield the magic of transformation.

name: Ring of Mental Power
description: This brushed silver band pulses with a catalyst for psionic minds, allowing you to expend energy when your reserves are gone.

name: Ring of Perfect Grip
description: This rough alloy band gives you a grip of steel when you are about to fall.

name: Ring of Personal Gravity
description: This gray metal band keeps your enemies within reach.

name: Ring of Protection
description: This simple ring of white gold is engraved with a tiny shield.

name: Ring of Ramming
description: This iron ring is inlaid with the image of a ram's head.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: This ring of plain silver is adorned with a blood red ruby.

name: Ring of Retreat
description: This silver ring allows you to teleport farther. It can also transport you and your allies to a distant redoubt.

name: Ring of Shadow Guard
description: While wearing this dark iron ring, your shadow is infused with black tendrils from the Shadowfell.

name: Ring of Shadow Travel
description: This dark iron ring lets you disappear into the shadows.

name: Ring of Sorrows
description: You conjure the manifestation of sorrow from this plain silver ring, tasking your foes with the agony of the Forgotten One's demise.

name: Ring of Spell Storing
description: This intricate wooden ring stores a measure of arcane power that can be unlocked in a time of need.

name: Ring of Spell Storing, Greater
description: This handsome gold ring contains a measure of arcane power that can be unlocked in a time of need.

name: Ring of Sympathy
description: These copper rings are shared by those who work well together.

name: Ring of Tactical Brilliance
description: The power of this golden ring helps protect an ally who changes position at your command.

name: Ring of Tenacious Will
description: Striped with platinum and amber, this band allows you to survive on force of personality rather than toughness of body.

name: Ring of Traded Knowledge
description: The knowledge seems as if it has always been within you, instead of gathered in the slim rune-carved band on your finger.

name: Ring of True Seeing
description: This gold band sports a white pearl that appears like an eye upon your finger.

name: Ring of Uncanny Judgment
description: This ring resembles the scales of justice bent in a circle, and it broadens your judgment of your surroundings.

name: Ring of Unfettered Motion
description: When you use this ring, you move so quickly that you're a blur.

name: Ring of Vigilant Defense
description: This large ring is composed of overlapping miniature iron, steel, mithral, and adamantine shields.

name: Ring of Windows
description: This simple wooden ring allows you to go places no one else can, and you can use it to open and close dimensional windows.

name: Ring of Winter
description: This glittering ring of unmelting ice shields you from cold and freezes foes around you.

name: Ring of Wizardry
description: This silver band is engraved with powerful arcane symbols.

name: Ring of the Crimson Sun
description: This obsidian bauble draws on the sun's heat, remaining comfortably warm day and night. It reinforces you in the face of flame and retaliates in kind.

name: Ring of the Deep Wood
description: This ring is made of intricately braided hair from the legendary Beast of Talgora's mane. The ring's magic strikes fear into your foes and calls insects of ancient forests to your aid.

name: Ring of the Fallen
description: This gold ring is engraved with the crossed-axes symbol of a long-dead army.

name: Ring of the Ghost Knight
description: This silver ring is inscribed with symbols of good gods.

name: Ring of the Phoenix
description: This red and gold ring is etched with the symbol of a fiery bird.

name: Ring of the Protector
description: Creations of the eladrin, these paired mithral and jade rings bond you to another.

name: Ring of the Radiant Storm
description: A gem of pure energy set into this platinum ring sharpens your mastery of light and lightning.

name: Ring of the Risen
description: This simple silver ring makes it easier for your allies to revive you.

name: Ring of the Spectral Hand
description: With a silent command, this onyx band conjures a translucent hand, and sometimes a spectral eye as well.

name: Ring of the Warforged
description: Decorated with dragonshards, this ring allows a wearer to grow to resemble a living construct.

name: Ring of the Zealous
description: This gold ring is inlaid with mother-of-pearl blessed by priests of old.

name: Ritual Candle
description: This candle of rune-carved purple wax gives off a clear, bright glow when lit.

name: Ritualist's Lectern
description: This heavy teak lectern is engraved with runes and patterns of arcane power.

name: Ritualist's Ring
description: This engraved mahogany ring allows you to cast rituals more quickly and easily.

name: River of Life Gloves
description: These gloves bear turquoise and green patterns that show the coastline leading to the mouth of the River of Life.

name: Roaring Bear Totem
description: Carved from the great claw of a dire bear, this totem growls like that mighty beast when you channel primal power through it.

name: Robe of Avoidance
description: When an enemy's attack misses you, this billowing robe confuses the foe so that you can get away.

name: Robe of Bloodwalking
description: This cloth armor rewards you for destroying your foes.

name: Robe of Contingency
description: Stitched with thread from the Feywild, this robe is favored by many wizards for its ability to escape a bind.

name: Robe of Defying Frost
description: Minute ice crystals from the Elemental Chaos stud this robe, which protects against the effects of cold and imbues your attacks with an icy chill.

name: Robe of Defying Storms
description: Embroidered patterns on these robes resemble clouds and great, slashing bursts of lightning. You gain both protection from storms and the ability to call upon their power.

name: Robe of Forbearance
description: This robe's plain cloth makes many enemies underestimate the defenses of the wearer.

name: Robe of Quills
description: Thin spines cover this robe, making any adversary reconsider before attacking the wearer.

name: Robe of Sapping
description: This robe saps the durability of an attacker's armor, making the creature no more protected than the robe's wearer.

name: Robe of Scintillation
description: Made of fine silks, this robe sheds light when you want it to, and it can also unleash a swirling melange of color that befuddles foes.

name: Robe of Stars
description: The dark, velvet fabric of this robe glimmers with delicate points of light that can burn brightly on command.

name: Robe of the Archfiend
description: Woven from the skin of humans, devils, and demons, these grim robes draw a viewer's eyes to the dominating gaze of the wearer.

name: Roc Armor
description: This armor is decorated with roc feathers. When you enter beast form, you can tap into the great beast's spirit to adopt its shape.

name: Rod of Avernus
description: This brass rod is tipped with a gleaming, red jewel that glows with a yellow aura. As you grasp it, your enemies instinctively cower before you.

name: Rod of Baleful Geas
description: This bronze rod has a greenish hue.

name: Rod of Blasting
description: This graven rod allows you to target multiple foes with your eldritch blast.

name: Rod of Blinding Awe
description: Divine power channeled through this rod overwhelms your foe with awe, rooting it in place.

name: Rod of Brilliant Wrath
description: When you invoke radiant power with this rod, you can intensify its power to daze or blind your foes.

name: Rod of Brutality
description: This glass rod brutally punishes those you curse.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against targets affected by your Warlock’s Curse.

name: Rod of Burgeoning Memory
description: The astral essence in this rod ties you more tightly to your earlier lives as a deva.

name: Rod of Corruption
description: This rod magnifies and multiplies your Warlock's Curse.

name: Rod of Cursed Honor
description: You can channel the power of your curse when you use this rod, increasing your defenses.

name: Rod of Dark Reward
description: This rod channels your Warlock's Curse while adding to your defenses.

name: Rod of Deadly Casting
description: Infused with war magic and covered in death symbols, this rod amplifies lethal magical strikes.

info.Description: Efreetweave uses rare reagents and metallic threads from the Elemental Chaos.

name: Rod of Death's Grasp
description: A rod that ripples with necrotic energy.
critical:: Ongoing 15 necrotic damage (save ends), and you gain 15 temporary hit points

name: Rod of Devilry
description: Infernal power flows through this rod, scouring your foes with hellfire.
critical:: +1d6 fire damage per plus, or +1d10 fire damage per plus against a bloodied target

name: Rod of Dispater
description: A symbol of Dispater's authority, this adamantine rod is shaped like two serpents entwined together, and it grants the power to scour foes with acid.

name: Rod of Divinity
description: This delicate silver rod lets you channel your deity's power back to yourself.

name: Rod of Draconic Fury
description: This rod was carved from a mighty red dragon's talon.

name: Rod of Dread
description: This crooked and hooked rod was used in Bael Turath to maintain order among slaves.
critical:: (Fear) The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

name: Rod of Dual Invocation
description: When unleashed, the mighty divine power contained within this rod allows you to echo your first attack with another devastating attack.

name: Rod of Elemental Shielding
description: The gauges on this thick baton are festooned with elemental runes, marking it as an artificer's implement. It augments spells that protect against energy.

name: Rod of Feythorns
description: Formed of a stalk and strange root bulb, this rod seems to weep steaming toxic liquid in battle. It magically poisons even those foes normally immune.

name: Rod of First Blood
description: This rod demands to strike first in any battle.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against creatures that have maximum hit points.

name: Rod of Flaying
description: A tangle of steel wires and barbed hooks extend from one end of this crimson rod.
critical:: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

name: Rod of Forceful Invocation
description: When your prayer smites your foes, they stagger backward under the weight of this rod's power.

name: Rod of Harvest
description: This rod stores the power of your pact boon so that you can unleash it when you want to.

name: Rod of Hope Triumphant
description: As your foe falls, the divine power of this rod invigorates you, for justice has been served.

name: Rod of Malign Conveyance
description: A smoky crystal caps this rod, which allows you to use your personal teleportation powers as weapons.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and teleport the target a number of squares equal to the rod’s enhancement bonus

name: Rod of Mindbending
description: Your enemies may have weak minds, but this implement softens them even more.

name: Rod of Obliterating Wrath
description: Crafted to create as much destruction as possible, this rod lets you pierce your foes' defenses and destroy groups of enemies.

name: Rod of Office
description: A badge of office and implement of power, this rod is granted to templars by their sorcerer-kings.

name: Rod of Reaving
description: This rod enhances the damage dealt to those suffering your Warlock's Curse.

name: Rod of Repair
description: This rod's wielder shares in the benefits he or she grants to an ally.

name: Rod of Resurgent Valor
description: Divine wrath channeled through this rod empowers your prayers against those who dare to attack you.

name: Rod of Retributive Justice
