description: As you clutch this rod, words of divine power spring to your lips to smite those who harm you.

name: Rod of Runic Resistance
description: The elemental runes on this thick baton mark it as an artificer's implement. It augments spells that protect against energy.

name: Rod of Scathing Scorn
description: Clutching this blackened bone scepter, you channel life-draining power at your enemy.

name: Rod of Scouring Justice
description: The divine wrath channeled through this rod cascades doom upon your foe.

name: Rod of Shadow's Caress
description: This rod summons tentacles of shadowy energy to impede your foes.

name: Rod of Silver Rain
description: This rod appears to be made from molten silver. It can create clouds that rain silver upon the battlefield.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus against fey creatures

name: Rod of Star's Descent
description: This rod tears a hole into the Far Realm, allowing maddening light to slip out and instill blinding insanity in your foes.

name: Rod of Starlight
description: This rod makes targets you curse feel the full force of the radiance you cull from distant stars.

name: Rod of Stolen Starlight
description: At your command, this rod infuses your spell with light from mysterious stars.
critical:: +1d6 radiant and necrotic damage per plus

name: Rod of Sylvan Trickery
description: You can use this rod to distort space, disorienting your enemy as you relocate the creature on the battlefield.

name: Rod of Time Distortion
description: This crystal rod allows you to distort time as you cast a spell, depriving an enemy of the opportunity to retaliate.

name: Rod of Ulban
description: The mind of your foe is made more susceptible to attack by the power of this blue-white crystal rod.

name: Rod of Vulnerability
description: This rod adapts to the weaknesses of those you curse.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus against a cursed target.

name: Rod of Wrathful Dismissal
description: This rod's power lets you move a foe into a position where your allies can deal with it.

name: Rod of the Bloodthorn
description: This rod thirsts for the blood of its prey and master alike.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus if you or the target is bloodied.

name: Rod of the Churning Inferno
description: Flames you create with this rod burn longer and spread to more foes.

name: Rod of the Dragon's Heart
description: An iron rod fitted with a small cage contains a glowing purple stone cut in the shape of a dragon's heart.

name: Rod of the Dragonborn
description: A fierce dragon head tops this scaly scepter.

name: Rod of the Feywild
description: Formed from exotic woods of the Feywild, this rod enhances the wielder's ability to teleport using the fey pact.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus with powers of the fey pact.

name: Rod of the Fickle Servant
description: This special rod gives you access to a different vestige when you need it.

name: Rod of the Hag
description: This slender obsidian rod is topped with a hag's eye that opens when you use your powers, terrifying your foe.

name: Rod of the Hidden Star
description: Formed of iridescent stone drawn from the Far Realm, this rod enhances the boon from the star pact, increasing your own powers and aiding allies as well.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 damage per plus with powers of the star pact.

name: Rod of the Infernal
description: This rod enhances one's ability to draw life from enemies using the infernal pact.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus with powers of the infernal pact.

name: Rod of the Pactbinder
description: An oath inscribed on this rod gives you quick access to one of your vestige patrons.

name: Rod of the Pyre
description: This rod crackles with arcane fire.

name: Rod of the Risen Dead
description: This delicate crystal rod allows you to take control of the mind and body of a slain foe.

name: Rod of the Shadow Walker
description: With this gloom-shrouded rod in hand, the shadows that coalesce around you seem deeper to those you' ve cursed.

name: Rod of the Sorrowsworn
description: This rod allows the wielder's curse to consume an enemy with sorrow and misery.

name: Rod of the Star Spawn
description: This crooked rod allows the wielder to draw upon the power of an insane entity known as the Star Spawn. The rod draws sustenance from your most devastating attacks.

name: Rogue's Belt
description: No one can hold you, no chains can restrain you, and no bars can contain you while you wear this slick belt.

name: Rogue's Gloves
description: These enchanted black gloves moderately improve thievery skills.

name: Rom Kala's Tideshield Ring
description: The magic of this blue-green ring protects you from the denizens of the sea and lets you stand fast in combat.

name: Rope of Climbing
description: A coil of golden rope.

name: Rope of Slave Fighting
description: You fight as well on your back as on your feet while wearing this frayed rope belt.

name: Roused Spirit Soulfang
description: Your spirit's claws grow long and drip phantom blood.

name: Rousing Hammer
description: The wrath you deal out with this dwarven hammer instills vigor in your allies.

name: Rovikar's Weapon
description: Inlaid with a delicate pattern in gold leaf, this weapon allows you to channel your own strength to an ally in battle.

name: Rubicant Blade
description: This beautiful and ornate weapon has seven runes inscribed on the blade and vibrates with power when held.

name: Ruby Lenses
description: These fine gold spectacles feature lenses of cut ruby.

name: Ruby Scabbard
description: Blood-red rubies adorn this scabbard, their magic granting your blade an extra edge.

name: Rune of Fiery Might
description: Summoning the rune's magic causes liquid fire to fill its etchings until they blaze with brilliant light.

name: Rune of Stone Eternal
description: You awaken the ancient rune to gird yourself in divine power.

name: Rune of Storm Unabated
description: Sparks fly from the rune when you access its power and thunder growls in your footsteps.

name: Rune of Tide Inexorable
description: Calling upon the silvery blue rune, you hear distant, crashing waves as its power suffuses you.

name: Runic Armor
description: The arcane sigils engraved on this armor glow in the presence of magical emanations.
armor:: Chain, cloth, hide, leather, plate or  scale

name: Runic Weapon
description: This weapon is engraved with numerous arcane runes and sigils that glow when magical emanations are near.

name: Rushing Cleats
description: These rawhide boot straps are fitted with spikes.

name: Rust Bark
description: When ground into a fine dust, this reddish tree bark expands the area of your powers.

name: Rust Bomb
description: On impact, this glass vial breaks, releasing a rusting agent that begins to deteriorate metal armor.

name: Sacred Glade
description: This clearing surrounds a sacred tree. When you meditate by the tree, you can refocus your primal powers.

name: Sacred Mask
description: This white porcelain mask with gold inlay is the bane of undead.

name: Sacrificial Weapon
description: The true severity of this weapon comes at a cost to the wielder's own vitality.

name: Saddle of Strength
description: This dyed leather saddle is inset with brass and allows a mount to carry the heaviest loads.

name: Saddle of the Nightmare
description: This black, twisted leather bridle lets you take advantage of your mount's ability to teleport.

name: Saddle of the Shark
description: This saddle allows you and your mount to swim and breathe underwater.

name: Safe Retreat
description: This compact case, jar, or pack provides a safe and comfortable environment for your arcane companion.

name: Safewing Amulet
description: This orange amulet reduces the damage you suffer when falling.

name: Sail of Winds
description: Elemental runes run the length of this fine sail of blue cloth, which fills with its own wind as it is raised.

name: Salubrious Armor
description: The shiny steel of the armor flushes red when its wearer heals, bestowing extra defense.

name: Salve of Power
description: This stoneware jar periodically renews a potent unguent that can restore a character's power.

name: Salve of Slipperiness
description: This oily gel makes it easy to escape restraint.

name: Sanctuary's Poise
description: Your time with the Nerathi exiles in the Feywild has given you ancient wisdom and the ability to slip into that world's mystic currents.

name: Sanctum of Astilabor
description: Depictions of an ancient red dragon, surrounded by heaps of treasure, cover the walls of this chamber.

name: Sandals of Arcane Transposition
description: Using an arcane power can teleport you in these rune-etched, open-toed shoes.

name: Sandals of Avandra
description: These airy, corded foot coverings allow you to move past even the largest and most dangerous enemies.

name: Sandals of Precise Stepping
description: Your steps become softer and more precise in this soft leather and cloth mesh footgear.

name: Sandals of the Temporal Step
description: The energy pulsing from the dragonshards adorning these slippers move likes hands on a clock.

name: Sandstorm Weapon
description: The dust trailing from this weapon explodes in a scouring storm when you land a telling blow on an enemy.
critical:: The target is blinded and takes ongoing damage equal to twice the weapon’s enhancement bonus (save ends both).

name: Sandwalker Boots
description: These supple buckskin boots let you glide through the desert sand like a dolphin through water.

name: Sanguine Vestments
description: The blood of wounded enemies only strengthens this deep red garment.

name: Sapphire Scabbard
description: This scabbard bears a matched pair of azure sapphires whose magic imbues your blade with deadly sharpness.

name: Sash of Ensnarement
description: While wearing this long braided wrap, your reach rarely exceeds your grasp.

name: Sash of Heroic Inspiration
description: This flashy, embroidered red sash proclaims your heroism to all.

name: Sash of Regeneration
description: While you wear this heavy brown hide sash, you heal at a tremendous rate.

name: Sash of Vitality Ceaseless
description: This sash's red and white coloring represents harm and healing, granting you increased vitality when you need it most.

name: Savage Armor
description: Grotesque faces contort on this armor's surface, howling with glee as the battle rages.

name: Savage Mask
description: The savage spirit whose visage marks this mask grants you strength against attacks that would sap your will.

name: Savage Weapon
description: Cruelly shaped, this weapon fuels your courage and your alacrity.

info.Description: Patterns taken from captured mind flayer garments led to mindpatterned armor.

name: Scabbard of Sacred Might
description: The blade drawn from this simple leather scabbard glows with a sacred radiance.

name: Scale of the Serpent
description: Forged by fomorians from a strange green ore of the Feywild, this armor makes you as slippery as a snake.

name: Scalebane Weapon
description: Reptilian creatures have good cause to fear this weapon.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus against reptiles.

name: Scar of the Dragon's Altar
description: Your visit to the Dragon's Altar has left you scarred by  ambient defiling magic that is the residue of the great beast's passing. That scar is more than just a sign of your visit; it has inured you to some of the harshness of Athas.

name: Scarab of Invulnerability
description: This night black amulet can be activated to make you invulnerable for a short time.

name: Scarf of Reconciliation
description: The shifting colors of this scarf reflect a common legacy, granting you power in the presence of your sibling-race allies.

name: Scavenger Bird Ki Focus
description: This onyx statue of a raven with outspread wings brings your mind to the Raven Queen and the task she set before you. She would not wish you to waste killing strokes upon the dying.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and any shrouds you chose to invoke before the attack deal 2 extra damage.

name: Scent of Weakness
description: After so many encounters with death, you still have the look of a stranger to battle. You give the false impression that you're slow, easy prey.

name: Scepter of Bane
description: This powerful scepter, tipped with the symbol of the Lord of Tyrants, is both a vicious weapon and a powerful implement.
critical:: +1d12 damage per plus when used as a weapon, or +1d8 damage per plus when used as a holy symbol

name: Scepter of Cimbar
description: This 2-foot silver rod is inset with pieces of jet, which have been carved and positioned to resemble a stylized dragon rampant. The scepter's ball-shaped hilt has a hole through its center, so that the implement can be hung on a sash cord around the waist.

name: Scepter of Winter
description: This ancient ivory scepter can create protective barriers and deadly rays of frost

name: Scintillating Armor
description: Woven from thread imbued with the fundamental powers of the cosmos, this armor can protect against energy and unseen forces.

name: Scorpion Carapace Armor
description: The spirit of the scorpion resides in this segmented armor.

name: Scorpion Mandible Helm
description: Fashioned using the mouth parts of a giant scorpion, this tremor-sensitive helm expands your awareness.

name: Scorpion Tail Blade
description: This magically envenomed blade leaves foes at your mercy.
critical:: The target is slowed and takes ongoing 17 poison damage (save ends both).

name: Scout's Bow
description: This wooden bow is adorned with images that resemble raptors' eyes. They keep a constant watch over the most evasive foes.

name: Screaming Armor
description: This impressive armor is covered in ornate patterns of screaming faces, enhancing your ability to shatter your foe's resolve.

name: Screaming Bow
description: What begins as a low moan rises to an earsplitting shriek as the arrow seeks out its mark.

name: Sculpting Mind
description: You channel psionic energy into your body to rise above your physical limitations.

name: Seashimmer Cloak
description: Phantom rivulets of water stream down this cloak, and when you're submerged, the cloak is indistinguishable from the water around it.

name: Secret of Life's Persistence
description: Your body is accustomed to the harsh environment, letting you tolerate the wasteland's dangers.

name: Secret of the Crimson Sun
description: You are inured to the harsh Athas sun, and you can share that hardiness with your allies.

name: Secret of the Wandering Dune
description: You race across desert dunes without impediment.

name: Seed of War
description: When you release this black metal acorn, it grows into a fierce soldier.

name: Seeing Stone of Yandere
description: This smooth stone instills a sense of calm and purpose. While holding it, you can think more clearly.

name: Sehanine's Mark of the Dark Moon
description: The priests of Sehanine speak of the dark moon, an invisible celestial object that casts protective shadows upon Sehanine's followers. As her favored one, you are shielded from harm by the dark moon.

name: Self-Made Legacy
description: You have worked tirelessly to create meaning greater the empire's dead heritage, and you're not about to let it end now!

name: Sending Fork
description: Speaking your voice into this tuning fork casts it farther across the world when used with magic.

name: Sending Stones (pair)
description: Each fist-sized round stone bears a Dwarven rune that translates as “Speak.”

name: Serpent's Kiss Bow
description: This bow bestows a kiss of toxic venom to its attacks, making your foes more vulnerable.
critical:: +1d6 poison damage per plus, and the target can’t shift until the end of your next turn.

name: Serpentine Armor
description: Metallic snakes writhe along the surface of this armor, ready to strike at any foe that tries to get by you.

name: Serpentine Bracers
description: Resembling coiled snakes, these bracers snap at your victim when you attack with surprise.

name: Serpentine OwlSerpentine Owl
description: : Many believe that explorers fashioned these owls to serve as companions and scouts for the first elves who traveled the world. The explorers used them to scout for suitable sites in which the elves could establish new communities beyond their native plane. Adventurers have recovered many serpentine owls and other figurines from these ruins, suggesting the complete collection owes its existence to these earliest mages and mystics.

name: Serpentskin Armor
description: Made from the discarded scales of a giant snake, this armor still carries the serpent's resistance to poison.

name: Severing Weapon
description: While you hold psionic energy in reserve, your weapon cuts deep.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus while you have at least 1 power point
augment_1:: Your attack deals 2d6 extra damage.

name: Sextant of the Planes
description: This small brass sphere unfolds to reveal a collection of crystal lenses, levers, and dials that provide guidance to nearby portals.

name: Shade Weapon
description: This weapon is crafted from gleaming black metal. Wisps of white energy shift and flow across its surface.

name: Shadow Band
description: Shadows leak from this ring to fill the space around you. When needed, you can call upon the ring to fully cover yourself in obscuring shadows.

name: Shadow Box
description: This plain teakwood box is covered with elaborate sigils that seem to have been burned into its surface. Now and again, the sigils dance and move, like shadows cast by a campfire.

name: Shadow Hound Armor
description: Crafted from the hide of a massive shadow hound, this armor lets you fade away from danger when you suffer a grievous wound.

name: Shadow Hunter Hide
description: This shimmering black hide armor allows you to get the drop on your foes.

name: Shadow Master Ki Focus
description: This small silver tablet is no larger than the handheld mirrors carried by many nobles, though tarnished and dull as if it has been neglected for many years. Secrets of shadow magic are carved into its surface in hundreds of lines of tiny text.

name: Shadow Spike
description: The wielder of this weapon moves like a shadow, silent and invisible until striking, and then only to disappear again.

name: Shadow Warlock Armor
description: While wearing this suit of black leather, you can cloud the mind of a cursed enemy so that your attack strikes true.

name: Shadow-Shroud Armor
description: This armor pulses with shadow when you are struck, lancing out to shroud you and your allies against further attack.
augment_1:: Effect: You and one ally within 3 squares of you gain total concealment until the end of your next turn.

name: Shadowdance Armor
description: This armor shrouds you like dim light woven into threads and sewn into garments.

name: Shadowdancer's Boots
description: These sleek boots lighten your steps, particularly while shadow conceals you.

name: Shadowdancer's Cloak
description: This flowing cloak obscures your movement while you are hidden.

name: Shadowdancer's Gloves
description: While you're hidden, these supple gloves make your attacks more deadly.

name: Shadowdancer's Mask
description: This featureless black mask aids your efforts to fool or hide from your foes.

name: Shadowfell Blade
description: The dark blade of this weapon seems to absorb light and shift as though it were a thing alive.
weapon:: Axe, heavy blade or  light blade

name: Shadowfell Gloves
description: These supple black gloves, woven with Shadowfell thread, are highly prized by wizards and warlocks.

name: Shadowfell Signet
description: This black ring of unknown metal bears the symbol of the Raven Queen in silver.

name: Shadowflow Armor
description: Inky tendrils of night seep from this pure black armor.

name: Shadowflow Shield
description: This inky, black shield conceals nearby allies.

name: Shadowrift Blade
description: You can pass through the Shadowfell to a nearby location when you use this blade, but doing so costs you a bit of your life force.

name: Shadowsteppers
description: You disappear into the shadows in these matte black fur slippers.

name: Shadowstrike Weapon
description: This weapon casts a long and dangerous shadow.

name: Shapechanger's Sorrow
description: This weapon traps a shapechanging creature in its present form.
weapon:: Axe, heavy blade or  light blade
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus against creatures not in their natural form.

info.Description: Druids and shamans use totems as focuses for their evocations. A totem is a short length of wood or bone, similar to a rod, which is carved to resemble a nature spirit and is adorned with feathers, fur, leaves, bones, teeth, and the like. A nonmagical totem confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Shaper's Armor
description: Your features seem to flow with each movement when you wear this nondescript armor.
augment_1:: The bonus increases to +4.

name: Shard of Clear Sight
description: Even through choking clouds of dust, you can cast off blindness.

name: Shard of Decay
description: This fragment of onyx, no longer than a human finger, thrums with magical energy. The shard seems to absorb light that hits it.

name: Shard of Evil
description: A shard of the Heart of the Abyss is concentrated corruption.

name: Shard of Freedom
description: You can win free of falling boulders or another effect that otherwise might pin and bury you.

name: Shared Suffering Armor
description: When enemies deal ongoing damage, this armor lets you deliver ongoing damage upon them as well.

name: Shared Valor Armor
description: The verses and images inlaid into this armor's surface are a source of inspiration for the wearer as much as for those who behold the armor.

name: Sharpshooter's Wand
description: You can shrink the size of your attack's area with this wand, making it more precise.

name: Sheaf of Arawai
description: Through this finely fashioned bundle of wheat stalks, Arawai's abundance sustains you.
requirement:: You must worship arawai or the sovereign host to use this holy symbol.

name: Shelter of Fate
description: You feel the hand of fate hovering above you, sheltering you thanks to the magic of the Deck of Many Things.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Shepherd's Arms
description: The protective magic of this crystal-bladed weapon hinders a foe's attacks against your allies.

name: Shepherd's Battle Standard
description: Set with scores of shining crystals, this banner inspires bravery in your allies and keeps enemies at bay.

name: Shield of Blocking
description: The best offense is sometimes a powerful defense.

name: Shield of Defiance
description: This enchanted shield provides immediate healing after you receive a critical hit.

name: Shield of Deflection
description: This enchanted shield reduces the damage you suffer from ranged attacks and area attacks.

name: Shield of Eyes
description: This multifaceted shield keeps you aware of lurking threats.

name: Shield of Fellowship
description: Polished to a bright sheen, this shield has magic that helps you share your resilience with allies.

name: Shield of Protection
description: This enchanted shield can be activated to provide you and an ally with magical protection for a short time.

name: Shield of Silver Light
description: This polished shield gleams with moonlight, even in the middle of the day.

name: Shield of Speed and Evasion
description: A serious strike that slides past this shield might fortify your ability to return the favor.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Shield of Turathi Defiance
description: Doomed rebels of ancient Bael Turath made such shields to protect their champions from tieflings and their infernal servants.

name: Shield of Ultimate Protection
description: This gold and silver shield protects you from every attack imaginable.

name: Shield of Warding
description: Activate the power of this shield to reduce the damage an ally suffers.

name: Shield of the Barrier Sentinels
description: This ornate shield is awarded to members of the Barrier Sentinels.

name: Shield of the Guardian
description: This oaken shield can guard an ally as well as protect you.

name: Shield of the World Tree
description: When you make use of healing energy, the magic within this solid heartwood shield protects your allies.

name: Shielding Blade
description: This sword's broad cross guard is larger and thicker than normal, but a few practice swipes with this weapon show that it is still perfectly balanced.

name: Shielding Focus
description: This small silver shield increases the strength of your protective circles.

name: Shielding Girdle
description: This item helps you turn away physical attacks.

name: Shielding Wand
description: As your spell obliterates your enemy, this heavy juniper wand creates a shimmering protective shield.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Shiftstone
description: Building these stones into your home removes handholds from would-be intruders.

name: Shimmering Armor
description: The sheen of this armor glints brightest when you most need its magical protection.

name: Shimmering Light
description: The thin but seemingly impervious layer of enchanted cloth stretched over the surface of this shield warns against danger.

name: Shining Sundial
description: This gem-studded silver sundial reflects light brilliantly, amplifying radiant effects.

name: Shipboard Armor
description: This black leather armor allows you to stand steady in the face of uncertain footing or a possible fall.

name: Shivli, White Wyrmling (Frost Weapon)
description: This spear is cold to the touch. Occasionally blue Iokharic runes appear across its surface, but the composition is never the same.

name: Shocking Armor
description: Created from forges charged with lightning, this armor ripples with electricity and makes any foe rue the decision to attack you.

name: Shockweave Armor
description: Metal studs on this armor magically protect you from lightning, and then unleash that same power against your foes.

name: Shoulderbow
description: Embedded in you back, this hidden hand crossbow springs to life at your whim.

name: Shrieking Songbow
description: The sound of unbridled fear travels along with each of your shots.

info.Description: Drowmesh uses strands of leather woven together in a fine lattice for maximum flexibility.
Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Shroud of Protection
description: This diaphanous shroud appears insubstantial. Yet when laid over a dying ally, it provides a defense stronger than steel.

name: Shroud of Ravens
description: Pulling this cloak's black hood over your head transforms you into a murder of ravens.

name: Shroud of Revival
description: This white gossamer shroud grants protection and bodily strength to a dying ally.

name: Siberys Shard of Merciless Cold
description: This amber dragon shard pulses with blue-white light.

name: Siberys Shard of Radiance
description: The shard glows with the light of Siberys.

name: Siberys Shard of the Mage
description: This orange dragon shard crystal enhances a weapon when it is used as an implement.

name: Sigil of Companionship
description: This medal, which can be strapped to a leg or hung around a neck, signifies the depth of experience you and your companion have working together.

name: Silence-Warded Room
description: This lush chamber offers privacy for your conversations.

name: Silent Tool
description: This mundane-looking tool muffles the noise you make while you work.

name: Silt Sandals
description: Dust and stains fall away from the surface and the tread of these simple clogs.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Silt Striders
description: Smooth-soled and vented for comfort, these fine shoes are woven from glassy fibers.

name: Silver Hands of Power
description: The pool of Ralyar glows with arcane power. When the wizard Fenstern dips his hands into the pool, he shrieks in pain. In exchange for this power, Fenstern accepts the momentary agony of the pool transforming his hands into living quicksilver.

name: Silver Orb of Dragonkind
description: This sphere of polished silver pulses with warmth and motion like a beating heart. It has the power to control silver dragons.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against silver dragons.

name: Silver Sand
description: Your healing powers become more effective after you coat your hands with this fine sand.

name: Silver Sky Tabard
description: This rich blue coat carries a silver dragon's head as a crest, and grants you the unstoppable resilience of a dragon.

name: Silver Wind's Vengeance
description: As you call upon the power of the storm, Silver Wind lends fury to your attack.

name: Singing Weapon
description: As you go about your bloody work, this elegant blade sings your praises.

name: Sitar of Restfulness
description: The sweet sounds of this breathtaking wooden stringed instrument instill a luck that can be realized only through boldness in action.

name: Skaivani's Anklets
description: These anklets of leather and copper let you surge across the battlefield.

name: Skald's Armor
description: A favorite item of wandering bards, this armor enhances your ability to talk your way out of tight situations.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Skating Boots
description: These steel-toed boots let you slide past foes in the heat of combat.
augment_1:: This movement ignores difficult terrain.

name: Skeletal Armor
description: Encased in bones, the wearer of this armor presents a terrible image of an undead creature, gaining similar resistances and making any undead hesitant to attack.

name: Skeleton Key
description: This ornate ivory key opens locks with ease.

name: Skewering Weapon
description: This weapon leaves behind an ephemeral shard that holds your foe in place.

name: Skin of Agonies
description: The likeness of a screaming face is etched across this armor, which protects you from your foes' harshest attacks.

name: Skull Bracers
description: These heavy bracers are each mounted with a long dragonlike skull.

name: Skull Helm
description: The face of this iron helm resembles a screaming skull.

name: Skull Mask
description: This rough iron visor is shaped in the likeness of a skull whose grim countenance saps your enemies' courage.

name: Skull Totem
description: Elaborate traceries cover this large humanoid skull. It has two horns, though one is broken off at the base. The skull is bound to a leather-wrapped haft, giving the object the shape and appearance of a mace.

name: Skybound Armor
description: This armor constantly flows like clouds across a gray sky and gives its wearer a feeling of weightlessness when moving.

info.Description: Bards and other characters use instruments for art and entertainment. A nonmagical musical instrument confers no game benefit but can be enchanted later.

name: Skygliders
description: This footwear allows you to walk across chasms, climb to ledges, and descend from precipices.

name: Skyrender Weapon
description: Air roils along the path of your ammunition, hindering or disabling a flying creature's ability to stay aloft.

name: Skystrider Horseshoes
description: A mount wearing these horseshoes can take to the air.

name: Slaying Stone of Kiris Dahn
description: Blood-red runes wind around this twisted mass of glassy black rock.
requirement:: This power can be used only in the city of kiris dahn or within 5 miles of its borders.

name: Slime Armor
description: You can cause this heavy armor to drip with acidic ooze that burns those who touch it.

name: Sliver of Knowledge
description: You discover the history of Iltani the Blue, Nebiru, and the Moon Chasers.

name: Sliver of Salvation
description: You throw off the lingering effects of enemy spells and ill effects with greater ease.

name: Sliver of Stability
description: Even when the ground shakes and shudders, you know how to stay on your feet.

name: Slow-Step Oil
description: A weapon coated with this white oil has the power to slow the movement of a foe.

info.Description: While you are not moving, these garments allow you to blend into your surroundings by granting you a +2 bonus to Stealth checks.

name: Smokestick
description: This rod of alchemical clay ignites to release a haze of obscuring smoke.

name: Snake's Lair Armor
description: The bumps of this snakeskin armor's surface tell your fingers about each ridge and valley encountered while tracking the Eternal Enemy to its lair.

name: Snakefang Armor
description: Bedecked in the fangs of serpents, this armor not only bestows resistance to deadly venoms but also endangers attackers.

name: Snaketongue Robe
description: A pattern of tiny, scintillating scales covers the surface of this loose garment, granting you the qualities of a serpent.

name: Sniper's Weapon
description: A bolt fired from this crossbow flies along a perfect path, ignoring all outside forces.

name: Solar Armor
description: This copper-plated armor seems to soak up the sun, shining with a red glow that is warm and invigorating.

name: Solitaire (Aquamarine)
description: This jagged blue-green crystal lets you intensify your attacks against your foes.

name: Solitaire (Cerulean)
description: This rough blue crystal grants you the ability to shake off lingering effects in the thick of combat.

name: Solitaire (Cinnabar)
description: This jagged red crystal boosts your resilience when you hit your foes hard.

name: Solitaire (Citrine)
description: This irregular yellow crystal channels healing power to you in battle.

info.Description: Wielding this metal pry bar gives you a +2 bonus to Strength checks to break open locked doors or containers.

name: Solitaire (Quartz Lens)
description: This clouded crystal supplements your powers with the energy of Athas's sun.

name: Solitaire (Violet)
description: This jagged purple crystal lets you follow up on a successful attack.

name: Songbow of Lullabies
description: The projectile fired from this weapon sings softly in a voice that its target finds most soothing.

name: Songbow of Summoning
description: When this weapon fires, an ancient paean sung by conquering peoples rings out and calls your allies in for the kill.

name: Songbow of Vanishment
description: Your magic whispers in the minds of your foes, convincing them you're elsewhere.

name: Sorrowsong Blade
description: This blade sings a mournful dirge of fear and despair as it slices through the air.

name: Sorrowsworn Ring
description: You can siphon life force from those you kill using this loop of black feathers bearing two gleaming jet gems.

name: Soul Drinker Weapon
description: If this weapon doesn't make a kill, it takes its frustration out on you.

name: Soul Ring
description: This platinum band, inset with a sparkling point of light, has a single word etched into its inside surface over and over in a variety of languages—”soul.”

name: Soul Shard Talisman
description: Heavy for its size, this black metal pendant emanates a wisp of blue smoke when a soul is trapped inside it.

info.Description: Using these cosmetics and prosthetics gives you a +2 bonus to Bluff checks to pass off your disguises.

name: Soul Shield
description: This shield of rough obsidian chills the spirit as well as the flesh.

name: Soulfang of Predatory Nature
description: This claw makes yours sharper.

name: Soulfang of Rage
description: While this fang bites at your flesh, you rage without end.

name: Soulfang of Resistance
description: Energy crackles around you once you use this, absorbing some that would damage you.

name: Soulfang of Retribution
description: Dark energy lashes from this fang at any creature that dares harm you.

name: Soulfang of the Cheetah
description: This cheetah's fang causes your legs to shift and warp into a form that lets you run faster.

name: Soulforged Armor
description: A bit of your own life force flows through this plate armor, granting you a moment of respite where others would succumb to the wounds of battle.

name: Soulwarding Armor
description: This armor strengthens your physical and mental resolve.

name: Sovereign Glue
description: This gray paste creates a virtually unbreakable bond between the objects it glues together.

name: Space-Bending Weapon
description: This weapon always seems farther away than it actually is.

info.Description: While wearing these felt soles over your normal footwear, you gain a +1 bonus to Stealth checks to move quietly.

name: Space-Shifting Bolt
description: Wrought in an eladrin design, this sizzling bolt teleports those it hits.

name: Spark Slippers
description: When you wear these magically supple glass slippers, foes who step too close to you pay the price.

name: Spectral Plate
description: This dull black plate armor is made of iron plates infused with Shadowfell essence, granting you wraithlike properties.

name: Spell Anchors
description: When you transfer control of a spell to these fine broadcloth gloves, the arcane rune on the back of each glove glows cheerily.

name: Spellshaper's Staff
description: This mahogany staff ends in a complex series of precisely angled bends.

name: Spellshield
description: This rune-inlaid shield can shelter an ally from a wide-ranging attack.

name: Spider Bolt
description: This web-strewn quarrel envelops the enemy when it hits.

name: Spider Potion
description: This pungent-smelling, sepia-colored concoction grants a spider's resilience against damage and poison.

name: Spider Rod
description: This gray metal rod is covered with a web of mithral studded with black onyx spiders.

name: Spiderkissed Weapon
description: The weapon's surface is covered in faint lines evocative of a spider's web.

info.Description: By affixing this tool to a piece of glass, you can quickly and silently etch the surface and create a round hole large enough to fit your arm through.

name: Spidersilk Mantle
description: Spun from the silk of a demonweb terror, this mantle grants you a spider's effortless ability to climb.

name: Spiderweb Robes
description: This light, thin robe is woven from spider silk and carries a hint of the power of arachnids.

name: Spiked Jacket
description: Hidden razor-sharp spikes spring out from the elbows, shoulders, and sides of this jacket when something grabs you.

name: Spiked Soles
description: These sole plates sprout tiny spikes, which aid in climbing and in keeping your footing.
requirement:: You must have the living construct racial trait to use this item.

name: Spirit Armor
description: This suit of fine chain has a ghostly sheen, and its mesh protects you from the denizens of the spirit world.

name: Spirit Eyes
description: Granted added sensitivity by guiding primal spirits, your eyesight pierces shadow and illusion.

name: Spirit Reliquary
description: You take heart knowing that your ancestors' bones rest inside the intricately carved box around your neck.
requirement:: You must worship the spirits of the past to use this holy symbol.

name: Spirit Shield Armor
description: This leather armor is engraved with images of beast spirits, and their power flows through your spirit companion to your allies.

name: Spirit of Sand
description: Calling forth the desert's power, you produce a short-lived blast of screaming wind and biting sand.

name: Spiritlink Armor
description: This armor absorbs both light and dark energy, and it can even transform that destructive energy into healing.

name: Splitting Weapon
description: This weapon breaks apart when you attack with it, hitting multiple enemies and then reforming.

name: Spotted Toadstool Venom
description: This green-gray poison paste robs its victim of strength.

name: Spring Renewal Totem
description: This totem carries the primal magic of spring. It represents the power to restore life.

name: Spying Mirrors (pair)
description: You look into one mirror and see out of its twin.

name: Spymaster's Quill
description: When you set this quill pen to parchment, traces of glowing golden light flare to capture the information you record.

name: Staff of Acid and Flame
description: This metal staff looks scorched and acid-scored, and it grants the wielder the power to sear enemies with acid and flame.
critical:: +1d6 acid and fire damage per plus

name: Staff of Aggressive Thoughts
description: Psionic energy flows through this iron staff to scatter the enemies confronting you.
augment_1:: You gain resistance to all damage equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

name: Staff of Artifice
description: Mechanical parts swirl around the end of this segmented steel shaft. When you infuse an artifice with creation, the staff gives a slight hum.

name: Staff of Bitter Dismissal
description: When you batter an enemy with a forceful attack, this gnarled staff 's potent psionic energy shunts the foe away from you.
augment_1:: Before you teleport the target, you slide each enemy within 3 squares of the target 1 square toward it.

name: Staff of Corrosion
description: Inlaid with fragments of jade, this staff devours an enemy's flesh with biting acid.

info.Description: Yuan-ti overlap fine “scales” of leather to produce the incredibly supple snakeskin armor.
Using an ordinary implement confers no benefit, but you can purchase an enchanted implement to gain an enhancement bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with your arcane powers.

name: Staff of Distant Shielding
description: With a word, you ward an ally against a foe's attack, promising swift retribution if harm comes to your companion.

name: Staff of Divinity
description: The glowing symbol of a deity rests atop this majestic staff.

name: Staff of Draconic Power
description: Razor sharp teeth emerge all along the length of this staff of fire-scorched wood.

name: Staff of Earthen Might
description: This staff channels the power of the earth to add strength to your limbs and weight to your blows.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus and the target is knocked prone.

name: Staff of Elemental Prowess
description: This staff grants mastery over—and protection from—the harsh elements.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus of the same type as the attack

name: Staff of Expansion
description: This collapsible pole is fashioned from a corroded copper pipe.

name: Staff of Fiery Might
description: This staff is engraved with fire symbols and is warm to the touch. It makes fire spells more potent.

name: Staff of Forceful Rebuking
description: Your foes can't resist the power of this crystal-capped staff when you forcibly move them.

name: Staff of Gathering
description: The sphere of smoked glass topping this staff transforms into a ball of raw energy when the wielder is struck by spells.

name: Staff of Insightful Detection
description: Armed with this delicate staff, you can intuit secrets and perceive those who wish to remain hidden.

info.Description: These golden or silver rings are created for members of the dragon marked houses as a means of identification. Each ring contains intricate patterns that become visible only when worn by the person for whom it was constructed.

name: Staff of Iron Infusion
description: With the aid of this iron staff, your healing artifices also toughen your ally's skin, making it resistant to damage.

name: Staff of Knives
description: This steel-gray wooden staff transforms into a steel-hard wooden dagger on command.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus when used as a melee weapon

name: Staff of Light
description: Clerics and paladins are not the only ones with radiant powers that sear undead.

name: Staff of Luck and Skill
description: Whoever wields this blond yew staff capitalizes on both luck and skill.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you gain a cumulative +1 bonus (up to a maximum of the staff ’s enhancement bonus) to all defenses each time you score a critical hit until the end of the encounter.

name: Staff of Missile Mastery
description: This dark wooden staff empowers a wizard's most basic attack.

name: Staff of New Horizons
description: This weathered wooden staff bears many scars, testimony to its heavy use in far-flung lands.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you teleport the target 1 square per plus

name: Staff of Portals
description: Topping this black staff is a crystal sphere that enhances your powers of teleportation.

name: Staff of Power
description: This staff, topped by a clawed hand holding a blue crystal, allows you to cast a spell twice.

name: Staff of Provocation
description: The enemy you smite with your attack is momentarily marked as anathema, provoking even its own allies to bring it down.

name: Staff of Psicraft
description: This crystal staff shapes psionic energy and reveals arcane secrets. By channeling energy into the staff, you can recover your own expended psionic energy.
augment_2:: You regain the use of this power.

info.Description: This bundle contains bottles of various animal scents, a guide to edible flora, a small knife, snares, and other useful tools. A hunter’s kit grants a +2 bonus to Nature checks made to forage.

name: Staff of Psychic Knives
description: This light metal staff lets you form a mental link to your foe. Through this connection, you can disorient the foe by sending jolts of pain into its mind.

name: Staff of Punishing Thoughts
description: The crystal that caps this bronzewood staff blazes with light, assailing the minds of your enemies and leaving them at your mercy.
augment_1:: Each enemy within 3 squares of you grants combat advantage to you (save ends).

name: Staff of Resilience
description: This black ash staff can absorb some of your life force and turn it into a protective aura.

name: Staff of Ruin
description: This gnarled, jagged staff fits the hand of any wizard seeking to devastate her opponent.

name: Staff of Scourging Revelation
description: The ancient glyphs carved into the wood of this staff weaken your enemies' ability to withstand the attacks of the mind.
critical:: The target gains vulnerability to psychic damage equal to twice the staff ’s enhancement bonus (save ends)
augment_1:: The size of the burst increases to 2.

name: Staff of Searing Death
description: This staff causes your fiery attacks to burn even hotter.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d8 fire damage per plus if the attack has the fire keyword.

name: Staff of Sleep and Charm
description: The crystal eye atop this dusky birch staff enhances spells that target the mind.

name: Staff of Spectral Hands
description: The true power of this staff lies in its clever utility.

name: Staff of Spell Blasting
description: Bound in silver, this polished pale elm staff violently channels arcane energy

name: Staff of Storms
description: This staff, covered in lightning runes, enhances the power of lightning and thunder spells.
critical:: +1d6 lightning or thunder damage per plus

info.Description: Members of the middle and upper classes in the Five Nations carry identification papers issued by their governments and notarized by House Sivis. Each set contains a description of the holder, a portrait, and other details. (Players may photocopy and customize the illustration of the identification papers.)

name: Staff of Time
description: This elegant birch staff is capped with a brilliant diamond whose power can cast foes out of time.
critical:: +1d12 damage per plus, and you can use the staff ’s power without expending its daily use, even if the power’s daily use has been expended.

name: Staff of Tongues
description: Language is no barrier while you wield this staff.

name: Staff of Transposition
description: A wizard armed with this staff needn't fear catching his allies within range of his most destructive spells.

name: Staff of Ultimate Defense
description: This sturdy wooden staff may not be the favored implement of war wizards, yet many find the safety it offers desirable.

name: Staff of Unfailing Talent
description: This staff is charged with psychic energy as long it remains in contact with you while you have a reserve of psionic energy.
critical:: +1d6 psychic damage per plus, or +1d10 psychic damage per plus if you have at least 1 power point

name: Staff of Unparalleled Vision
description: Wizards who keep to the outskirts of a battlefield favor this glass-topped staff.

name: Staff of Verdant Growth
description: This gnarled wooden staff grows leafy tendrils along its length when activated.

name: Staff of Wind
description: This feather-light staff of cloudy crystal allows you to command the air.

name: Staff of Winter
description: This staff is engraved with winter symbols and is cold to the touch. It adds to the effect of your cold spells.

name: Staff of the Adaptable Mind
description: This staff lets your body move at the instant you perceive a threat, allowing you and your friends to avoid harm.
augment_1:: Each ally adjacent to you also gains the resistance until the start of your next turn.

info.Description: Members of the middle and upper classes in the Five Nations carry identification papers issued by their governments and notarized by House Sivis. Each set contains a description of the holder, a portrait, and other details. (Players may photocopy and customize the illustration of the identification papers.)

name: Staff of the Blinking Artifice
description: Artifices created with this staff flicker from one place to the next across the battle field.

name: Staff of the Discerning Watcher
description: This crystalline staff focuses your senses to help you perceive your surroundings better.

name: Staff of the Evader
description: This green wooden staff ensures that you can slip out of harm's way when you're held in place.

name: Staff of the Faithful Arcanist
description: This alabaster staff is topped with a deity's symbol for those who consider their powers to be a gift from their god.
requirement:: You must have the initiate of the faith feat.

name: Staff of the Far Wanderer
description: When you burn your foes with radiant power, the four white stars set at the head of this staff send you effortlessly across the battlefield.

name: Staff of the Impregnable Mind
description: This adamantine staff protects you from mental attacks. By channeling power into it, you can increase the protection it offers to include all attacks.
augment_1:: You instead gain the bonus to all defenses.

name: Staff of the Iron Tower
description: This iron staff provides a bastion for your mind and the minds of your allies.

name: Staff of the Lich
description: The pale wood of this staff resembles polished bone.

name: Staff of the Magi
description: In the hands of a powerful wizard, this staff is a potent arsenal of magical might.

name: Staff of the Renewing Source
description: This staff draws on residual psionic energy, allowing you to expend less energy when you strike a foe.

info.Description: This gear includes several containers made from different materials, brushes, mundane dusts, tweezers, picks, probes, a magnifying glass, ink and quills, parchment, and a small journal. An inquisitive’s kit grants a +2 bonus to Perception checks to search an area for something specific.

name: Staff of the Serpent
description: Shaped like a rigid cobra, this bronze staff enables you to wield poison as a deadly weapon.

name: Staff of the Sunburst
description: Adorned with a gleaming solar disk, this staff can erupt with radiant power when you are hit.

name: Staff of the Temporal Juggler
description: This multicolored staff allows you to steal bits of time from your enemies to accomplish more than you normally could.

name: Staff of the Third Eye
description: This staff has a capstone carved to resemble a closed eye. The eye opens when you channel a power through an ally's location.

name: Staff of the Traveler
description: This ruddy staff looks as if it has seen many lands and many times, and it offers you the same opportunities for travel.
critical:: You teleport the target 2 squares per plus

name: Staff of the War Mage
description: This staff, topped with a red crystal, enhances the size of your blast and burst spells.

name: Stag Helm
description: This helm sports a set of antlers and makes you as alert as a stag.

name: Staggering Weapon
description: When you hit with this weapon, you send your foes lurching headlong whichever way you wish.
weapon:: Axe, flail, hammer, heavy blade or  mace

name: Stalker's Armor
description: Shadowfell and Feywild energies blend to make this armor the ultimate hunter's apparel.

name: Stalwart Belt
description: Each time you deal a grievous wound to an enemy, you feel the invigorating power of this belt.

info.Description: The king of Breland issues Letters of Marque to groups exploring Xen’drik’s ruins. Travelers may visit and explore the continent freely, but those who sell Xen’drik’s treasures without the proper documentation face fines, incarceration, and forfeiture if caught. (Players may photocopy and customize the illustration of the letter of marque.)

name: Stanching Armor
description: This form-fitting armor clings to you as if it were a second skin, sealing your wounds.

name: Standard of the Silver Dragon
description: The silhouette of a silver dragon's head stands out against the blue background of this standard.

name: Star Opal Ring
description: This black band sports a star opal that glows softly.

name: Star Rod
description: Made from metal refined from meteorites, this dark rod glimmers with pinpoints of light. It allows the wielder to temporarily gain access to the powers associated with the star pact.

name: Star Ruby Ring
description: This handsome ruby ring is favored by courtiers who rise and fall by the favor they earn with their honeyed words.

name: Star of Corellon
description: This star-shaped pendant flashes with an inner light when you unleash arcane or divine energy.
requirement:: To use this symbol, You must worship corellon.

name: Star of the Astral Sea
description: This immense blue star sapphire glows when your allies approach death and allows you to use your own life force to rejuvenate them.

name: Star-Strewn Scarf
description: This shimmering black scarf protects your vision even as it hinders your enemies' attacks.

name: Starlight Goggles
description: These dark leather goggles sparkle with tiny silver studs, aiding your vision in dim light.

name: Steadfast Amulet
description: The crystal set in this amulet helps to focus your mind.

info.Description: Spellshards are fragments of crystal that contain power and knowledge, usually of an arcane nature. If your class would normally store its arcane powers in a spellbook, you can instead store your powers in a spellshard if you possess one.        All the enchantments and features available through a tome are also available through a spellshard. Members of any class can use a spellshard in place of a ritual book or a ritual scroll.

name: Steadfast Boots
description: Rough iron studs nailed to these boots buttress your defenses.

name: Steadfast Saddle
description: This saddle keeps you mounted when faced with effects that might normally knock you off your mount.

name: Steady Boots of the Ram
description: These fur-lined leather boots give you the sure-footed step of the mountain ram.

name: Stern Handler's Wraps
description: Beasts of all kinds shy away from the wearer of these plain looking wraps, which glimmer with small dragonshards.

name: Stern Mountain Totem
description: The strength of the mountain beneath the ram's hooves flows into your attacks.
critical:: +1d8 per plus, or +1d10 per plus with charge attacks

name: Stone Band
description: This ring of basalt becomes more polished and intricately carved each time you use it.

name: Stone of Avandra
description: Breathing a quick prayer to Avandra, your faith is channeled through this stone to turn the fates in your favor.
requirement:: To use this symbol, You must worship avandra.

name: Stone of Earth
description: This smooth brown agate is warm to the touch, and the arcane symbol for “earth” adorns it.

name: Stone of Flame
description: The arcane symbol for “fire” smolders within this chunk of red-tinged anthracite.

name: Stone of Light
description: This oval bead of white quartz has the arcane symbol for “radiance” on its surface.

info.Description: Crossing national boundaries is risky without a set of notarized travel papers. Like identification papers, they include personal details about the traveler—place of residence, occupation, and destination. (Players may photocopy and customize the illustration of the travel papers.)

name: Stone of Shadow
description: The arcane symbol for “darkness” etched across this nugget of glossy hematite seems to absorb all light.

name: Stone of Spirit
description: This swirled teardrop of lapis is scribed with the arcane symbol for “spirit.”

name: Stone of Storms
description: The arcane symbols for “thunder” and “lightning” are scribed on opposite faces of this piece of rough obsidian.

name: Stone of Wind
description: This pale blue zircon is scribed with the arcane symbol for “air.”

name: Stoneborn Armor
description: Worked from rough stone, the plates of this bulky armor enable its wearer to tap into the limitless endurance of the earth.

name: Stonemeal Biscuit
description: This coarse dwarven fare tastes foul but keeps you going throughout the day.

name: Stonemeld Armor
description: The stony surface of this sigil-covered armor can harden to briefly absorb the brunt of attacks.

name: Stonesign, Dwarf Guardian (Shield of Warding)
description: The hallmarks of dwarven craftsmanship and style are all present in this shield, and Dwarven runes decorate it. When you're near this shield, you get a faint inkling that it wants you to pick it up.

name: Stoneskin Armor
description: In battle, these gray robes harden your skin and grant additional resilience.

name: Stonewall Belt
description: This rough gray belt covered in stone plates grants stability to its wearer.

info.Description: This magic bread fills the stomach and provides all necessary nutrients with only a few small bites, so you can carry food for a long journey without weighing yourself down.

name: Stonewall Shield
description: Favored by dwarves, this shield can create a temporary barrier much like a wall.

name: Storm Gauntlets
description: The gold and iron plates bolted to the back of these gauntlets crackle with energy.

name: Storm Shield
description: Shifting clouds play across the surface of this shield as it protects you from stormlike effects and then unleashes them on your foes.

name: Storm Torc Tattoo
description: Pulsing with blue lightning, this tattoo of spirit summons the winds.

name: Stormbiter Warblade
description: Glistening with electric-blue eldritch energy, this weapon's blade packs a stormy punch.
critical:: +1d6 thunder and lightning damage per plus

name: Stormcatcher Ring
description: This copper ring has a setting but no gemstone. When you use the ring, sparks fill the setting.

name: Stormlash Soulfang
description: This fang sends lightning dancing up your arm into your weapon.

name: Stormlord Armor
description: With this armor, you can bend the elements to your will, harnessing the power of the storm.

info.Description: Yuan-ti weave stands of snakeskin armor with shadow magic to produce anathema armor.
Using a nonmagical ki focus confers no benefit. You should use a non-magical ki focus if you have feats that give you a benefit with them, such as implement expertise (ki focus).

name: Stormwalker's Cloak
description: This dark gray cloak with lightning-bolt edging provides protection from lightning and thunder damage and can be activated to deal such damage to your opponents for a short time.

name: Stormward Shield
description: Trimmed in copper, this azure shield tapers to a sharp point.

name: Stornont's Deep-Pocket Cloak
description: Hundreds of magically hidden pockets on this cloak allow you to keep a wealth of items close at hand.

name: Stout Weapon
description: This weapon looks for cracks in an enemy's fortitude instead of chinks in his armor.
weapon:: Axe, hammer, mace, pick or  staff

name: Strikeback Tattoo
description: A viper is commonly part of this tattoo.

name: Strikebacks
description: Backed with spikes, these vicious gauntlets hurt those who hurt you.

name: Striker's Weapon
description: A weapon of purest silver that glows with arcane light.

name: Striking Staff
description: This steel staff is favored by wizards who enjoy fighting in the thick of a battle.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus when used as a melee weapon.

name: Strongheart Tattoo
description: This image shows why the hero fights on.

name: Strongheart Weapon
description: You can overcome bodily weakness when you attack with this weapon.

info.Description: Wearing this mask and loose-fitting robes gives you a +2 bonus to Endurance checks to resist heat or to avoid the effects of persistent dust or sun glare.

name: Stylus of the Translator
description: This writing implement allows you to scribe in translation.

name: Subtle Weapon
description: Plain and simple, this weapon works best when you already have an edge on your foe.

name: Sudden Escape Armor
description: This shimmering armor allows you to invoke astral energy to spirit yourself away from an attack.

name: Summer Growth Totem
description: Summer brings growth, and the primal energy channeled through this item helps spawn vines that hinder your foes.

name: Summon Silt Elemental
description: You call forth a damaged and destructive silt elemental, keeping it under your control for a short while.

name: Summoned Armor
description: One need never worry about being caught unarmored while possessing this extraordinary armor.

name: Summoner's Staff
description: This hawthorn staff is engraved with the images of dozens of different creatures.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if a creature you summoned scored the critical hit

name: Summoner's Tome
description: Outlines of creatures are burnt into the cured-hide cover of this book, which holds many summoning secrets.

name: Summoning Bullet
description: Use this magnetic bullet to bring an ally closer to your foe.

name: Sun Disk of Pelor
description: This holy symbol flashes with light as your faith unleashes radiant energy that sears your enemies.
requirement:: To use this symbol, You must worship pelor.

info.Description: A disguise consists of a convincing outfit, makeup, and other accoutrements needed to pass oneself off as someone else. A disguise grants a +2 bonus to Bluff checks made to appear as someone else.

name: Sun Globe
description: After being installed in a socket on the wall or ceiling, these fistsized crystal globes shed light when commanded.

name: Sun Shield
description: This golden disc flares with radiance as you wield it.

name: Sun Sphere
description: This tiny sphere in the shape of the sun circles your head, burning foes who move too close.

name: Sunblade
description: This heavy golden sword attacks with the power and intensity of the sun, burning nearby enemies.

name: Sunfury Totem
description: Constantly warm to the touch, the bleached bone and crystal of this totem depicts the glaring sun.
critical:: +1d6 radiant and fire damage per plus

name: Sunwrath
description: The glistening silver-white metal of this blade is inscribed with flowing arabesques. Its hilt is adorned with gold, with a ruby set in the middle of the handguard.
critical:: +1d6 fire and radiant damage per plus

name: Supporting Armor
description: This heavy iron armor absorbs the shock of jarring attacks.

name: Suppression Crystal
description: The crystal diminishes the lightning bolt and silences the thunder.

name: Suppression Weapon
description: On your command, this weapon creates a shimmering field of energy around your foe that contains your enemies' attacks.

info.Description: Desert travelers use distillation kits to extract water from wastes or toxic fluids. The device “cooks” moisture from the materials and collects it in a reservoir. Using a distillation kit for 6 hours produces 1 day’s worth of water.

name: Supreme Skirmisher's Bow
description: Perfectly balanced and blessed with powers that help shape each of your motions, this bow allows you to fight with unmatched grace.

name: Supremely Vicious Weapon
description: Pure lethality
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, and you can choose to reroll any or all of your critical damage dice, but you must take the second result of each die.

name: Sure Shot Gloves
description: These slick gloves guide your shots unerringly.

name: Surefoot Boots
description: Attached snugly by rows of shiny buckles, these boots help keep your footing.

name: Surfsurge Shoes
description: These supple shoes can send their wearer soaring above foes on a surge of water.

name: Surge Armor
description: Many great heroes have survived dangerous battles thanks to the offensive and defensive benefits of this armor.

name: Surprise Bullet
description: This winking bullet blinks in and out, so your target can't see it coming.

name: Survivor's Armor
description: This armor fills its wearer with a sense of security while in the company of devoted allies.

name: Survivor's Belt
description: This belt lets you demonstrate fortune’s favor when you are brought to the brink of death.

name: Survivor's Boots
description: These rough hide boots are clearly well used, but they never wear out.

info.Description: This forked rod can be used to ferret out hidden water reservoirs. It grants a +2 bonus to Nature checks made to forage.

name: Sustaining Cloak
description: The master arcanists of Bael Turath bound supernatural spirits to these cloaks to fuel their power.

name: Swift Shaper's Soulfang
description: You tap into your primal soul and you become more naturally adept at shifting into your beast forms.

name: Swift-Step Boots
description: These nondescript leather boots let you run past any obstacle.

name: Swiftpad Boots
description: These supple boots lend a lion's strength to your leaps.

name: Swiftshot Weapon
description: This weapon reloads and fires faster than any other crossbow.

name: Swiftstrike Shoes
description: More supple shoes never touched the foot of a hero, and in these shoes a hero's feet sometimes barely touch the ground.

name: Swimtide Harness
description: More than a few sea captains who have lost their ships in storms have survived due to these blue oilskin straps.

name: Sword of Black Ice
description: Carved from a sliver of black ice from the abyss, this deadly sword never melts.
critical:: +1d10 cold damage per plus and the target is dazed.

name: Sword of Melancholy
description: The magic of this well-notched blade fills your foe with a dread malaise that leaves it open to further attack

name: Syllable of Grace
description: The sigil Uur flares with pale light, lending grace and speed to your movements.

info.Description: Affixing this mask over the face allows the wearer to breath normally in adverse conditions, such as during a dust storm.

name: Syllable of Life
description: When Hoon shines, you feel vigorous and youthful, as if no hurt could ever stop you.

name: Syllable of Spirit
description: When you manifest Vaul's brilliant light, your spirit shines with uncommon brightness, making it hard for other enemies to strike you.

name: Syllable of Strength
description: Aesh burns brightly, filling you with uncommon power and strength.

name: Syllable of Thought
description: Naen's shining beacon clarifies your thoughts, helping you to anticipate danger.

name: Symbol of Astral Light
description: You invoke the power of your god to banish the darkness.

name: Symbol of Astral Might
description: This symbol is a potent tool against creatures from the Elemental Chaos.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against elemental creatures.

name: Symbol of Branding
description: As you utter a prayer, this symbol flares to sear your god's icon into the forehead of your foe.

name: Symbol of Brawn
description: Physical strength and holy devotion are both enhanced by this adamantine holy symbol.

info.Description: A fire kit includes sticks and a small bow. It is used to start a fire.

name: Symbol of Brilliance
description: This holy symbol shines with the fiery spirit of your devotion, infusing the intensity of your beliefs into blinding power.

name: Symbol of Censure
description: Your faith transforms this mundane-looking holy symbol into a mesmerizing beacon that distracts your enemy.

name: Symbol of Confrontation
description: This holy symbol enhances the power of your divine challenge.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against enemies currently marked by you.

name: Symbol of Courage
description: You draw strength from your pious devotion, which allows you to stand fast in the face of any terror.

name: Symbol of Damnation
description: Your pious hatred for an enemy is enhanced by this holy symbol.

name: Symbol of Daring
description: When you wield this symbol, your allies are inspired to strike boldly.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 radiant damage per plus with attacks made when you spend an action point

name: Symbol of Dedication
description: When you smite foes that you have marked as an enemy of your god, this holy symbol gives you divine protection against that enemy.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against enemies currently marked by you.

name: Symbol of Defense
description: On command, this symbol generates a mantle of force to defend a comrade.

name: Symbol of Dire Fate
description: This symbol glimmers with divine light as you press your advantage against an enemy.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus against enemies currently marked by you.

name: Symbol of Divine Force
description: Through this symbol, you batter foes with your relentless conviction.

info.Description: Woven from tough strands of giant hair, this rope is used for making strong cord. Giant hair rope has resist 10 to all damage.

name: Symbol of Divine Light
description: The fierce radiance of this symbol is the bane of foul creatures that can't bear sunlight.

name: Symbol of Divinity
description: This holy symbol gathers the power of your divine attacks, allowing you to rechannel that might.

name: Symbol of Excellence
description: Your devotion to your divine patron inspires others to attain the heights of excellence.

name: Symbol of Fire and Fury
description: This symbol is made of red iron streaked with fiery, bright metal. While you wear it, you can blast your foes with righteous flame.
critical:: +1d6 fire damage per plus, and each other enemy within 5 squares of you takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Symbol of Foe Turning
description: Through this symbol, you can punish specific enemies of your faith as well as vile undead.

name: Symbol of Freedom
description: This symbol allows you or one of your allies to shrug off certain debilitating conditions.

name: Symbol of Gajz
description: The runes that adorn this holy symbol allow your healing powers to grant resistance to your allies.

name: Symbol of Good Fortune
description: Divine fortune favors you, bolstering your ability to strike accurately at your enemies.

name: Symbol of Hope
description: The power of your faith makes it easier for allies to recover from debilitating effects.

info.Description: Travelers value sun balm to ward against the sun’s pernicious effect. Sun balm grants a +2 bonus to Endurance checks made to endure heat.

name: Symbol of Life
description: The power of your faith adds energy to your healing prayers.

name: Symbol of Lifebonding
description: This symbol diverts some the energy devoted to your attack into healing for a nearby ally.

name: Symbol of Mortality
description: This symbol is a potent tool against undead and immortals.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against undead or immortal creatures.

name: Symbol of Penitence
description: This symbol ensures that light continues to sear your enemy even after your initial attack.

name: Symbol of Perserverance
description: This symbol glows with an inner light, preserving a fragment of your life force to bestow when you or an ally needs it most.

name: Symbol of Power
description: The power of your faith makes it harder for enemies to recover from debilitating effects.

name: Symbol of Prayers Recovered
description: Your prayers are rarely wasted while you wear this holy symbol.

name: Symbol of Protection
description: This symbol allows you to shield a companion from the threats of your foes.

name: Symbol of Radiance
description: This symbol glows with the power of your faith.

name: Symbol of Radiant Vengeance
description: As you assail an enemy with attacks, this symbol causes your strikes to burn with radiant energy.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 radiant damage per plus if the target attacked an ally of yours since the end of your last turn.

info.Description: A survival day is an abstract representation of the preparations a traveler must make to navigate the wastelands without risk of exposure. Each survival day includes water, food, proper apparel, and common unguents to ward off sunburn.

name: Symbol of Reflection
description: As you present this glittering symbol, divine power turns your enemies' attacks back against them.

name: Symbol of Reproach
description: This symbol delivers a debilitating attack that saps your enemy's vitality and impairs its ability to persevere.

name: Symbol of Resilience
description: This symbol bolsters confidence and allows allies to shrug off even the deadliest effects.

name: Symbol of Revivification
description: This symbol holds the power to revive a dead or dying ally.

name: Symbol of Sacrifice
description: When you attack with this symbol, you can choose to sacrifice some of your vitality to aid a nearby comrade.

name: Symbol of Scorned Fate
description: This symbol, shaped like a double-headed coin, lets you elude fate for a split second.

name: Symbol of Security
description: The hand of fate intercedes on behalf of your allies.

name: Symbol of Shared Healing
description: While you wear this symbol, your can heal an ally even as you tend to your own wounds.

name: Symbol of Shielding
description: Your holy symbol glows as you conjure a nimbus of protection.

info.Description: Swordwing leather mimics the way swordwings make their paper spires, creating a light, flexible, and hard leather.
Fermented kank nectar, this foul, intoxicating beverage is mixed with herbs to mask its taste.

name: Symbol of Sustenance
description: This symbol is infused with a fragment of your consciousness that allows you to turn your attention elsewhere in battle while maintaining other powers.

name: Symbol of Turning
description: Clerics use this potent weapon to battle the undead.

name: Symbol of Unified Defense
description: This symbol is engraved with several rings linked in a circle, representing the interdependence of you and your comrades.

name: Symbol of Vengeance
description: This symbol allows you to exact your wrath upon enemies, returning their attacks with devastation.

name: Symbol of Victory
description: Your god helps those who help themselves.

name: Symbol of Vigor
description: This symbol rewards your good health with divine might.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus while you’re at maximum hit points

name: Symbol of the Champion's Code
description: A code of honor is inscribed on this symbol, reinforcing your commitment to your god and making your challenge irresistible.

name: Symbol of the Deep
description: This small holy symbol sways in your grip, and when its power is used, it surrounds a foe in a column of swirling water.

name: Symbol of the Dragon
description: This symbol shields you from dragons' attacks.

name: Symbol of the First Spirits
description: An oath of dedication to the natural spirits of the world is inscribed in fine script upon this wooden holy symbol.

info.Description: Local dialects and distinct languages can be insurmountable barriers to travelers. The interpreter offers services as a translator.

name: Symbol of the Forgotten One
description: The divine power of this battered symbol conceals you from your foes.

name: Symbol of the Holy Nimbus
description: This symbol combines the images of sun and moon. When you speak a word of healing, you and your allies are bathed in restoring light.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you or an ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge.

name: Symbol of the Radiant Flame
description: This symbol appears to be made of brilliant living fire hung on a chain of molten metal, but it doesn't burn your skin.
critical:: +1d6 fire and radiant damage per plus, and each ally within 5 squares of you gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to the symbol’s enhancement bonus until the end of your next turn. The bonus damage is fire and radiant.

name: Symbol of the Warpriest
description: This symbol lets you turn your advantage in battle into a bolstering effect for your allies.

name: Talent Shard
description: This crystal shard contains the essence of a specific talent. When you extract it, you gain insight into that talent for a short time.

name: Talisman of Fortune
description: This small gold talisman renews a magic item or strengthens your health, attacks, and defenses in turn.

name: Talisman of Repulsion
description: This platinum talisman is inset with astral diamonds that flash brightly and unleash a burst of force when you are threatened.

name: Talisman of Terror
description: This amulet depicts a face with an expression of abject terror.

name: Tanathriel Staff
description: This wood and bronze staff feels right in your hands but at the same time dreamlike and unnaturally light, as if only partially real. Its power protects you from illusions and enchantments.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you and allies within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

info.Description: Most city-states demand payment before allowing travelers to enter their gates.

name: Tanglefoot Bag
description: This small leather bag or satchel contains a sticky gel that can immobilize foes.

name: Targeting Weapon
description: When the bolt flies from your weapon, it shows the way to victory.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

name: Tattered Cloak
description: This ragged cloak holds a secret defense.

name: Tattoo of Arcane Blood
description: Rods, orbs, the eye of Ioun, and other images symbolic of magic are used for this tattoo.
