name: Tattoo of Bloodied Chains
description: This tattoo shows a coiled length of bloodstained chain.

name: Tattoo of Bonded Defense
description: One hero standing before a wounded ally is perfect for these tattoos.

name: Tattoo of Bonded Escape
description: The image of a surly dwarf holding a corridor while allies escape works well for these tattoos.

name: Tattoo of Shared Consequence
description: These tattoos usually display a hero taking a wound for another.

name: Tattoo of Shared Vengeance
description: Swords, axes, implements, or other tools of war crossed in brotherhood serve well for these tattoos.

name: Tattoo of Vengeance
description: This tattoo shows wicked-looking blades and bolts of lightning, representing the comeuppance you will extract.

info.Description: A crodlu is a large, flightless drake with a beak and weak, clawed forelimbs that can be used to manipulate small objects. It is a tough and aggressive hunter in the wild. When trained, it makes an excellent war mount.

name: Tattoo of the Escape Artist
description: Broken handcuffs and torn straitjackets are popular for this tattoo.

name: Tattoo of the Penitent Martyr
description: This tattoo depicts a pair of hands held together in prayer and bound with blood-red cord.

name: Tattoo of the Shared Heart
description: These marks resemble something dear, something to fight on for.

name: Tattoo of the Unlucky
description: Broken coins, three-leaf clovers, mirror shards, or all three do nicely for this tattoo.

name: Tattoo of the Wolverine
description: This tattoo is invariably a wolverine, snarling and bloody.

name: Taulmaril the Heartseeker
description: The deep finish of the wood in this bow has not been marred by the ages. Silvery glowing arrows poke out from the top of its matching quiver, waiting to be fired at unwary foes.
critical:: +1d6 force damage per plus, and the target falls prone

name: Tauran Shield
description: This horn-edged shield helps you charge your foes with bull-like force.

name: Teamstrike Tattoo
description: These tattoos frequently show wolves acting as a pack.

name: Tectuktitlay's Sacrifice
description: The rapacious and spiteful Father of Life demands regular sacrifices.

name: Telepathy Circlet
description: A boon to leaders and liars, this mithral band allows you to communicate without speaking, and extract the thoughts of another.

info.Description: A crodlu is a large, flightless drake with a beak and weak, clawed forelimbs that can be used to manipulate small objects. It is a tough and aggressive hunter in the wild. When trained, it makes an excellent war mount.

name: Teleportation Disk
description: Usually set in the floor, this large, ornately inscribed teleportation circle moves you quickly around your domicile.

name: Teleporting Armor
description: A small teleportation circle is emblazoned on the breastplate of this armor.

name: Temblor Weapon
description: You send a shockwave of primal energy through the ground that shakes the firmament.

name: Tempest Fan
description: The tines of this metal fan resemble lightning, augmented with ripples of electricity.

name: Tempest Staff
description: The power of the storm drives your foe back and blasts enemies pressing your allies.
critical:: +1d6 lightning damage per plus against each enemy adjacent to you, and each other enemy within 3 squares of you takes thunder damage equal to half the amount of lightning damage.

name: Tempest Whetstone
description: This unfinished iron whetstone lends your weapon a spark.

name: Temporal Armor
description: This armor steals future moments to aid you in the present.

name: Tenacious Weapon
description: A wielder of this weapon favors dependability over luck.

name: Tenebrous Mask
description: This thin slip of black silk allows you to target foes shrouded from your sight.

name: Tenebrous Shroud
description: This cloak wraps around you in inky blackness.

info.Description: The erdlu is a smaller version of the crodlu. Its body is covered in tough scales, and its folded forelimbs sprout useless wings. Hardy and fast, this drakelike creature is a fine riding beast for a Small rider. It is too skittish to be trained for war, however.

name: Tenser's Circular Shield
description: This iron miniature of a circular shield protects your goods as they follow along behind you.

name: Tension Wheel
description: With a click, the tension wheel unlocks and propels the bolt through your enemy.
requirement:: You must be holding a crossbow.

name: Terror Ichor
description: With this vial of bewitching pixie blood, you can terrorize your foes with greater efficacy.

name: Terror Weapon
description: The bite of this weapon sends waves of fear through its target.

name: Tethercord
description: You fling the device at the enemy; one side sticks to the creature while the other bonds with the ground.

name: Thane Blood Weapon
description: Each time you drop an enemy, the bloodlust in your allies mounts.

name: The Clutch of Lolth
description: Inside this silken orb, the candled shadows of Lolth's slowly maturing progeny writhe ceaselessly while awaiting the chance to pour forth from their gestation and engulf the enemies of the Demon Queen of Spiders.

name: The Fading One - Battle Ghost
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

name: The Fading One - Ghostfoot
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

name: The Fading One - Life Drain
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

info.Description: An inix, also called a dune behemoth, is a long, lowslung reptile with bony plates on its back. It is strong and spirited. An inix rarely eats anything as large as a humanoid, but it does not shy away from a fight.

name: The Fading One - Lighter than Wind
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

name: The Fading One - Spirit Body
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

name: The Fading One - Touch from Beyond
description: You have begun to fade from this life, little by little. One day you will fade away completely, but the legend of your extraordinary power will endure.

name: The Fearcatcher
description: This grotesque mockery of a traditional dreamcatcher is framed with the bones of sacrificed children and intricately webbed with cord made from the stretched and tanned viscera of an angel.
requirement:: You must worship lolth.

name: The Raven Queen's Shroud
description: The Raven Queen cloaks her champions in a shroud of darkness, a halo of divine magic that aids them in enforcing the dictates of fate.

name: The Scrolls of Ummanabora (Mnemonic Staff)
description: Thousands of lines of runic text spiral around the entire length of this staff.          You feel the presence of great knowledge when you are near the object.

name: The Skinsplitter
description: Used by the disciplinarians of the drow academies, this wicked weapon symbolizes cruelty.

name: Thieving Weapon
description: This weapon adds insult to injury by stealing away its victim's possessions.

name: Thorn Grasp Soulfang
description: The spectral vines you command grow sharp thorns as they entangle your foes.

name: Thornwalker Slippers
description: These padded foot coverings allow you to pass cleanly through cluttered or grasping terrain.

info.Description: Kanks are docile insects that form hives. Each member of the group has a role: food producer, soldier, or the brood queen. The kank soldier can be trained for riding and battle.

name: Thought-Eater Armor
description: The gaze of your enemies slides off this nondescript armor, almost as if you weren't there.
augment_1:: You have total concealment instead of concealment.

name: Thoughtspike Weapon
description: As you strike with this weapon, it fires spikes of mental energy into each foe that is focusing its attention on you.
weapon:: Heavy blade, light blade or  spear
augment_2:: The psychic damage equals 1d10 + the weapon's enhancement bonus.

name: Thoughtstealer Weapon
description: With this weapon, you not only break through an enemy's physical defenses but its mental defenses as well.

name: Throne of Dominion
description: This throne is carved with ornate filigree and reliefs showing a king ruling over subjects that span the chair's entire surface.

name: Throne of Grandeur
description: This magnificent carved stone throne is decorated with symbols and images of nobility and heroism.

name: Throwing Shield
description: When tossed, this throwing shield packs a hefty punch.

name: Thunder Wand
description: This sturdy wand enhances the destructive might of your thunder attacks.

name: Thunderbolt Weapon
description: This weapon imbues its ammunition with electricity and can create a bolt that jumps from one target to another.

name: Thunderburst Weapon
description: Suddenly, the projectile explodes in a burst of violent sound.

name: Thunderfist Ki Focus
description: Roiling thunder booms with each strike you make, the metal of this focus vibrating as you assail your enemies with a cacophonous din.

info.Description: These massive creatures serve as draft animals given their tremendous pulling strength. They are aggressive, however, and have been known to turn on handlers.

name: Thundergod Weapon
description: A loud crash of thunder erupts from this weapon when you charge and strike an enemy.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 thunder damage per plus on a charge.

name: Thunderhead Armor
description: The metal of this armor seems to roil with various shades of purple and gray, as though it's filled with storm clouds. The wearer feels resistant to the powers of the storm.

name: Thunderstone
description: On impact, this clay sphere unleashes a clap of thunder that can deafen creatures and knock them back.

name: Thunderwave Staff
description: This rune-covered staff emits waves of thunder that deal damage and knock enemies prone.

name: Tiamat's Bloody Bulwark
description: This breathtaking crimson shield, crafted from a single immense scale pried from the hide of Tiamat, protects its wielder from even the mightiest blows.

name: Tigerclaw Gauntlets
description: These gauntlets, which imbue you with the power of a pouncing tiger, have a sharp talon extending outward from each.

name: Time Link Armor
description: Woven from shimmering crystal, this light chain suit improves your reaction time.

name: Time-Jumping Boots
description: For a brief moment, these nondescript boots allow you to step out of time and evade your enemies' attention.

name: Timeless Locket
description: This golden locket helps you make the most out of each moment.

info.Description: Cages are made of strong material to confine creatures. A cage has equally spaced bars and a door. Bar spacing can be customized to specific creatures. The typical cage can hold two creatures of its size, a creature one size larger (uncomfortably), or four to six creatures one size smaller. (Creatures more than one size smaller than the cage probably will be able to slip out between the bars.) Cages are normally transported on animals or vehicles. A vehicle such as a wagon can have a cage permanently mounted to it by adding the cage cost to the vehicle cost.

name: Timeless Tome
description: This tome enables you to further manipulate the boundaries of time.

name: Tinkersuit
description: This armor's magic lets you store an abundance of gear, even as it generates a defensive field in response to attack.

name: Tiren's Sphere
description: This golden sphere can bind much more than simple words.

name: Tombforged Armor
description: This armor is constructed around a single link from the burial armor of a hero dead at least 100 years.

name: Tome of Arrest
description: This tome's cover is emblazoned with the symbol of a golden clenched fist.

name: Tome of Crushing Force
description: This jet black tome is inset with several moonstones and radiates power.

name: Tome of Enduring Creation
description: Your summoned creatures are more durable when you wield this leather-bound tome.

name: Tome of Striking Lightning
description: Sparks leap between the covers of this copper-bound tome.

name: Tome of the North Wind
description: Covered in a thin patina of frost even in blazing heat, this tome unlocks the secrets of ice magic.

info.Description: Dwarves use earth energy to fortify earthhide, mimicking the strange living-earth skin of creatures such as the galeb duhr and the earth titan.

Cages are made of strong material to confine creatures. A cage has equally spaced bars and a door. Bar spacing can be customized to specific creatures. The typical cage can hold two creatures of its size, a creature one size larger (uncomfortably), or four to six creatures one size smaller. (Creatures more than one size smaller than the cage probably will be able to slip out between the bars.) Cages are normally transported on animals or vehicles. A vehicle such as a wagon can have a cage permanently mounted to it by adding the cage cost to the vehicle cost.

name: Tome of the Replenishing Flame
description: This tome's copper binding is pleasantly warm to the touch.

name: Tooth of Chaos
description: This dagger seems to change shape in your hand, becoming precisely what you need to strike your enemy.

name: Torc of Bin A'kin
description: This ornate white-gold neckpiece is adorned with jewels and etched with arcane runes.

name: Torc of Fortune
description: This large silver hoop of eladrin make is worn around the neck. It is decorated with a fine pattern resembling dragon scales.

name: Torc of Power Preservation
description: This platinum and gold neckband contains a reservoir of energy that you can tap.

name: Torch of Misery
description: Flames encircle the end of this black and gold wand.

name: Torog's Lamentation of the Shackled
description: Torog grants his boon to ardent disciples whose embrace pain and bondage. Only by pledging themselves body and soul to the King that Crawls does Torog release them from earthly restraints.

name: Totem of Ashen Fury
description: After you use this totem, your hand becomes stained with soot, the remnants of a land ruined by defiling magic.

name: Totem of Enduring Vigilance
description: This totem is carved with eyes big and small to remind you to be watchful against daelkyr aberrations.

name: Totem of Nature's Balm
description: When you wave this totem, decorated with dried herbs, healing light streams from your spirit companion into your allies.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and one ally you can see within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.

info.Description: Cages are made of strong material to confine creatures. A cage has equally spaced bars and a door. Bar spacing can be customized to specific creatures. The typical cage can hold two creatures of its size, a creature one size larger (uncomfortably), or four to six creatures one size smaller. (Creatures more than one size smaller than the cage probably will be able to slip out between the bars.) Cages are normally transported on animals or vehicles. A vehicle such as a wagon can have a cage permanently mounted to it by adding the cage cost to the vehicle cost.

name: Totem of New Beginnings
description: This bone totem gradually changes color in your hands, shifting from green to gray to black to green again.

name: Totem of Thunder's Keeper
description: A stylized face carved into this totem animates with an angry growl to rebuff those who harm your allies.

name: Totem of Unleashed Flames
description: The edges of this bone totem are charred, hinting at the danger inherent in the centrally embedded red jasper.

name: Totem of Winter's Scorn
description: Carved from a branch of winterfir tree, this totem channels the bitter cold of the tundra.
critical:: +1d6 cold damage per plus, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

name: Totem of the Awakened Bear
description: Carved in the form of a yawning beast, this totem rouses your spirit companion against opponents that draw your attention.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you’re bloodied

name: Totem of the Crashing Tide
description: Moisture continually beads over the conch shell that forms this totem and then evaporates, reflecting the tides in which it once lived.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you push the target 1 square per plus.

name: Totem of the Dancing Leaf
description: This rod is made from one of the legendary Beast of Talgora's dorsal spines. Three leaves of the extinct gossamer tree drift around you whenever this totem is held in your hand.

name: Totem of the Flensing Sands
description: When you place this burnished sandstone fetish to your ear, you can hear the sandstorm's distant howl.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you slide the target 1 squares per plus

name: Totem of the Harrier's Claws
description: This totem, covered in owl feathers and talons, grants you the ferocity of a hunting bird against weakened prey

name: Totem of the Night
description: This totem of blackened wood is shaped like a stylized bat and allows you to pierce the veil of night.

info.Description: Cages are made of strong material to confine creatures. A cage has equally spaced bars and a door. Bar spacing can be customized to specific creatures. The typical cage can hold two creatures of its size, a creature one size larger (uncomfortably), or four to six creatures one size smaller. (Creatures more than one size smaller than the cage probably will be able to slip out between the bars.) Cages are normally transported on animals or vehicles. A vehicle such as a wagon can have a cage permanently mounted to it by adding the cage cost to the vehicle cost.

name: Totem of the Ravenous Beast
description: This hideous bloodstained totem gorges itself on the life energy of your foes.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a target granting combat advantage to you

name: Totem of the Satyr's Dance
description: This gnarled branch, carved to look like a horn, channels the frenetic dance of reveling satyr spirits.

name: Totem of the Scouring Wind
description: Used by desert-dwelling centaur tribes, this totem shaped from sandstone summons the power of the terrible simoom.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target takes ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

name: Totem of the Severed Eye
description: The severed eyes placed upon this totem can blind a foe or expose invisible creatures to your sight.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

name: Totem of the World Tree
description: The rich wood of this totem is warm to the touch. You can feel the life of the world pulsing through it.
critical:: Each ally within 3 squares of you gains 1d6 temporary hit points per plus (roll once and apply the result to each ally).

name: Totemic Belt
description: This colorful hide belt infuses you with the ferocity of a wild beast, augmenting your attacks.

name: Totemic Spear
description: This spear's power extends into the spirit world.

name: Totemic Warclub
description: Some of the power invested in your spirit companion also flows through this warclub.

name: Tourmaline TurtleTourmaline Turtle
description: : Among the most powerful figurines is the coveted tourmaline turtle. The figurine is not so much prized for its considerable power in battle, but for the utility it offers to its conjurer. The turtle, when called forth from the small carving, is enormous, with a mighty structure on its back offering shelter and comfort to those permitted entry. Furthermore, the device also functions as a vehicle, allowing passengers to cross the planes with but a single command.

name: Toxic Tome
description: This snakeskin-bound tome gives off a slight acrid scent.

info.Description: A common item found in the hands of the most dangerous assassins, a poisoner’s kit consists of a collection of tools, vials, and base ingredients used to concoct deadly poisons. Possession of a poisoner’s kit is usually grounds for arrest in most civilized areas, since there is little good that can come of the substances that the kits require.

name: Tracking Dust
description: You spread the fine grains of this silver dust to reveal the subtlest tracks.

name: Transference Weapon
description: With this weapon, your enemies need take heed of what afflictions they place on you, lest they suffer them as well.

name: Translocating Armor
description: A field of planar energy surrounds this armor. If an enemy fails to hit you, you can teleport out of its reach.
armor:: Chain, cloth, hide, leather, plate or  scale

name: Transposing Weapon
description: Thanks to this weapon, you and the target of your attack switch places.

name: Transposition Harness
description: This silken harness fits tightly around your companion and allows the creature to swap places with you.

name: Trapping Shield
description: This shield opens like a portal at your command, briefly trapping your enemy inside.

name: Trauma Bracers
description: When you land a serious blow while wearing these jagged arm guards, the wounds you inflict resist healing for a time.

name: Traveler's Ring
description: This tarnished silver ring set with a muddied stone looks mundane. When you wear it, it tugs you in the right direction.

name: Treeform Box
description: A leaf placed into this small wooden box does not decompose.

name: Trespasser's Bane Weapon
description: No enemy can elude this weapon's wielder without risk.

info.Description: The soil contained within this small, plain bag has been blessed by a cleric or some other wielder of divine magic. If sprinkled over a casket or grave, blessed soil prevents any corpse buried therein from rising as an undead creature due a ritual. However, blessed soil has no effect on undead creatures that return to life due to other means. A creature might rise as a ghost if compelled to do so by a curse imposed upon it. Many communities require that blessed soil be used as part of any burial ritual. All too often, con artists and unscrupulous ritualists offer fake blessed soil at cheap rates, leaving graveyards rife with potential skeletons and zombies.

name: Trickster's Mask
description: This velvet masquerade mask is highly prized among the more shadowy worshipers of Avandra.

name: Triflik's Blade
description: This thin, silver-coated dagger is imprinted with the seal of the Kiris Dahn forgemasters' guild.

name: Trollhide Bracers
description: These ugly green wrist guards become indispensable when you are wounded.

name: Trollskin Armor
description: Trolls hate everyone, but especially you and your warty green armor.

name: True Kiss of the Mistress
description: The Golden Mistress gave you her true kiss of trust, imparting wards of protection against enemies that would harm you. Little did she know that your enemies were soon to be her own minions.

name: Tumbler's Shoes
description: Though worn, these well-built shoes allow you to move with a cat's grace through even precarious terrain.

name: Tuning Songblade
description: As your blade strikes the enemy, it rings out with a perfect note that echoes.

name: Twice-Clawed Gauntlets
description: The ritual which creates these leather or hide gauntlets merges the claws of a second predator onto the paws of a base creature, so that the claws on your gloves shift magically between the natural weapons of two great predators.

name: Twining-Scorpion Tattoo
description: This tattoo of blood wraps down your forearms onto your wrists. The harshly inked scorpion isn't pretty, but in your hands vengeance is always pretty messy.

name: Twinkle
description: Its star-cut blue sapphire sparkling with moonlight, Twinkle slices arcs of brilliant energy in air and flesh.

info.Description: Fashioned from fat rendered from a slain ghoul, a ghoul candle sheds light that is invisible to undead. It functions as a normal candle, except that it provides no illumination for undead creatures. Gravediggers use these candles when they must venture into a cemetery at night, in hopes of avoiding the notice of any ghosts or similar creatures that might be about.

name: Tyrant's Weapon
description: This harsh-looking weapon lets you capitalize on your enemies' vulnerabilities.

name: Umbral Eye
description: Coils of darkness writhe across this fist-sized silvery orb's surface. Through it, you can see a shadowy world that mimics your surroundings.

name: Unbroken Lance
description: This weapon glows with the power of your righteousness when you charge.

name: Unfettered Thieves' Tools
description: The picks, keys, and tongs of this set of thieves’ tools appear ordinary—until they rise into the air to move under your mental command.

name: Unforgettable Cudgel
description: A well-placed strike with this mace goes a long way toward showing an enemy the error of its ways.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or the target is dazed (save ends)

name: Ungol Dust
description: This black powder dissolves organic material.

name: Unguent of Blindsight
description: You can perceive visible and invisible dangers alike with this white cream.

name: Unguent of Darkvision
description: Darkness is less impenetrable with this black ointment.

name: Unraveling Weapon
description: Ancient oaths carved into this weapon flare with crimson light when you call on them, overcoming your enemy's protections.

info.Description: This plain black feather ends in a small iron needle. When the item’s user pricks a creature’s skin with the needle, just enough to draw blood, the feather forms a mystic bond to that creature. At the moment of that creature’s death, the black feather turns bloodred. Merchants and travelers leave raven’s feathers with their loved ones, while some thieves’ guilds and mercenary bands require initiates to leave one with their superiors. One of these feathers is by no means infallible. There is no way to inspect the feather to ensure that it is linked to a specific person. It is easy enough to fake one’s death by passing off a feather attuned to a different creature as belonging to someone else.

name: Unseen Servant's Hand
description: This barely visible glass hand improves your magical, invisible work force.

name: Unvanquished Grace Ring
description: The distinctive gold and silver weave of this grace ring is carved with feathers.

name: Utility Staff
description: A boon to practical spellcasters, this staff increases the range of one's utility spells.

name: Vampiric Gauntlets
description: These dark gauntlets pulse with necrotic energy and appear to draw in the light around them.

name: Vampiric Weapon
description: This blade saps life from its opponent, bestowing you with the creature's lost vitality.

name: Vanguard Weapon
description: Favored by soldiers of the frontline, this weapon makes any charge formidable.

name: Vanous's Combined Awareness
description: Your companion's guttural growl alerts you to danger.
requirement:: You must have the beast mastery or beast mastery (hybrid) class feature.

name: Vanous's Coordinated Assault
description: You follow your beast's lead and smash into the enemy.
requirement:: You must have the beast mastery or beast mastery (hybrid) class feature.

name: Vanous's Menacing Beast
description: Seeing you imperiled prompts your beast companion to strike.
requirement:: You must have the beast mastery or beast mastery (hybrid) class feature.

name: Vanous's Savage Spirit
description: When you draw on your inner reserves, your beast companion heartens, finding new vitality.
requirement:: You must have the beast mastery or beast mastery (hybrid) class feature.

info.Description: This sturdy leather valise includes well-packed glassware, a burner, a mortar and pestle, and dozens of jars of common alchemical reagents. You need an alchemy case, or access to an alchemical workshop, to use alchemist powers.

name: Vaporform Armor
description: While wearing this armor, no prison can hold you, no door can block your path, and no height is beyond your reach.

name: Vecna's Boon of Diabolical Choice
description: Vecna grants the user a taste of what his severed hand has to offer.

name: Vecna's Puzzle Box
description: Great secrets are revealed to you by your possession of this fistsized brass puzzle box.

name: Veil of Night
description: This diaphanous cloth seems made of shadows and twinkling stars. With it you can vanish from sight.

name: Vengeance Sash
description: This dark binding allows you to vent your wrath against those who defeat you in battle.

name: Vengeful Spirit Totem
description: Infused with the rage of a thousand vicious beasts, this totem makes your spirit companion intimidating in battle.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 per plus with a primal spirit attack power

name: Vengeful Weapon
description: When an ally's life is on the line, the wielder of this weapon becomes a deadly adversary.

name: Venom Gloves
description: The embroidered serpents on the back of these snakeskin garments writhe when you use them.

name: Venomous Songblade
description: Like the words you whisper to your enemies, this weapon is filled with poison that saps their strength.

name: Venomous Songbow
description: The arrows that fly from this weapon are laced with poison that lingers in the target's system long after your attack.

info.Description: As a standard action, you can drop these smooth metal spheres into an adjacent square (or gather them back up). Any creature moving on the ball bearings must either treat the square as difficult terrain or succeed on a saving throw to avoid falling prone. Creatures that are running can use only the latter option.

name: Verdant Presence
description: The power of the Forest Father flows through you, causing the land to flourish in your presence. With his blessing you can bind your enemies with this abundant growth.

name: Verdant Silence Weapon
description: This deadly blade appears as a sharp stylized leaf, set on a hilt of burnished wood.

name: Verdant Staff
description: This writhing staff is composed of thin vines that constantly flourish and wither.

name: Versatile Armor
description: The wearer of this armor moves with more alacrity than one might expect, and can employ that speed to his or her advantage against unprepared enemies.

name: Versatile Spellbook
description: The pages of this spellbook are magically treated, allowing you to quickly draw on their arcane power.

name: Verve Armor
description: This armor protects your body and fortifies your spirit.

name: Veteran's Armor
description: Battered and worn, this unassuming armor helps you get the most out of your experiences.

name: Vicious Rod
description: This rod enhances the deadliness of your curse.

name: Vicious Weapon
description: Some wielders claim this weapon takes pleasure in dealing pain.

name: Victory Flash Weapon
description: You strike your enemy down with dazzling flare, and this weapon responds in kind.

info.Description: A bell is useful for setting an alarm, while blowing a whistle lets you alert comrades at a greater distance.

name: Vigilant Blade
description: Set with the symbol of an upright gauntlet with an unblinking eye in its palm, this blade bursts into burning white light in the hands of one sworn to bring justice to the wicked.
critical:: +1d8 fire and radiant damage per plus

name: Vigilant Gargoyle
description: This ghastly stone gargoyle looks like a typical church decoration, but it's much more than that.

name: Vigorous Resolve Vestments
description: These embroidered vestments channel your resolve and imbue you with resilience.

name: Viper Belt
description: This snakeskin belt provides modest protection against poison.

name: Vision Sand
description: Blessed by Ioun's clergy, this sparkling crystalline sand enhances divinations.

name: Vision of the Vizier
description: The Deck of Many Things has blessed you with knowledge well beyond that possessed by other mortals.

name: Vistani Buzuq
description: Music plucked from this long-necked, fretted lute soothes the worn and weary, especially those who keep time with the tune.

name: Vistani Eye Amulet
description: A large tiger-eye jewel serves as this item's pendant. The jewel sometimes moves like an actual eye, and it helps you discharge eye-related effects.

name: Vistani Tambourine
description: A tiny drum with ringing jingles, or zils, this instrument helps you keep a lively tempo despite difficulty.

name: Vistani Violin
description: This fiddle looks well used, but sturdy and merry. Its tune brings forth strong emotions, inspiring resolute action.

info.Description: Thicker and heavier than leather, hide armor is composed of skin from any creature that has a tough hide, such as a bear, a griffon, or a dragon. Hide armor can bind and slightly hinder your precision, but it’s light enough that it doesn’t affect your speed.        Magic appears at higher item levels, and grants higher armor bonuses than its mundane counterparts. Hide armor grants +4 AC at levels 16-25, and +5 AC at levels 26-30.
Feyhide armor is treated with an elven process that gives resilience akin to the hide of tough fey beasts.
After you attach this set of simple machines to a solid surface, you can pass a rope through it to triple the weight you can lift, pull, or drag on the other end of the rope.

name: Vitality Armor
description: When you take a serious wound while wearing this armor, it feeds you back a bit of your lost vigor.

name: Vitality Drinking Weapon
description: This finely crafted weapon seems to drink in the light, just as it drinks in the life of your enemies.
critical:: +1d6 necrotic and psychic damage per plus

name: Vitriolic Weapon
description: Black, scaly hide covers the weapon's grip and the steel has a greenish cast.

name: Voidcrystal Armor
description: Black as a starless night, this armor destabilizes weapons it deflects.

name: Voidcrystal Weapon
description: This black crystal weapon can briefly banish a creature to a dark, secluded location.

name: Voran's Floating Lantern
description: This silver lantern floats in midair under your control.

name: Vorpal Weapon
description: There is nothing as sharp as the bite of a vorpal blade.

name: Vortex Mask
description: This eerie mask has a mouth from which no light escapes, and it draws foes toward that darkness in a great inhalation.

name: Vortex Shield
description: Arcane runes form a spiral pattern on the surface of this shield, which serves to draw large attacks toward it.

info.Description: This kit includes caltrops, a crook-eye, disguise kit, gambler’s gear, gambling cheats, and a glass cutter. Many purchasers supplement this kit with goodnight tincture.

name: Vortex Stone
description: This stone from the Shadowfell imbues your conjurations with a magical field that saps your foes' strength.

name: Wailing Songbow
description: The arrows launched by this weapon scream out a note, even while embedded in your foes.

name: Wailing Tome
description: The hideous faces whose skin forms the binding for this book wail like tortured souls each time it is used.

name: Waistband of the Grappler
description: This fur-lined wrap channels the strength and the recklessness of an accomplished wrestler.

name: Walking Death
description: One moment, your victim is all smiles. The next, it keels over and dies.

name: Wall Armor
description: This armor seems far heavier than its constituent material. It becomes as unforgiving as a brick wall at a moment's notice.
armor:: Chain, cloth, hide, leather, plate or  scale

name: Wallwalkers
description: These supple spidersilk boots give you the mobility of an arachnid, if only for a brief time.

name: Wand of Allure
description: Charms cast through this twinkling golden wand reach the most distant of foes.

name: Wand of Aptitude
description: When you direct your allies with this lacewood wand, they reach beyond their normal limitations.

name: Wand of Cold
description: Frost covers the tip of this wand, threatening to unleash its icy chill.

name: Wand of Eldritch Rain
description: This wand carries the warlock spell eldritch rain.

name: Wand of Erupting Flame
description: Your mastery over flame increases the more you fight.

name: Wand of Fiery Bolt
description: This wand carries the warlock spell fiery bolt.

name: Wand of Fire Burst
description: This wand carries the wizard spell fire burst

name: Wand of Icy Rays
description: This wand carries the wizard spell icy rays.

name: Wand of Psychic Ravaging
description: With this wand in hand, your psychic attacks tear through your enemies' minds.

name: Wand of Radiance
description: A pinpoint of light dances on the tip of this wand.

name: Wand of Ray of Enfeeblement
description: This wand carries the wizard spell ray of enfeeblement.

name: Wand of Shield
description: This wand carries the wizard spell shield.

name: Wand of Soul Flaying
description: This wand carries the warlock spell soul flaying.

info.Description: You can look around corners with the angled mirrors in this leather-bound wooden tube. You grant combat advantage and take a -2 penalty to Perception checks while using a crook-eye, but you can trace your line of sight from a square adjacent to you.

name: Wand of Swarming Force
description: The invisible forces you wield through this wand strike with deadly power.

name: Wand of Witchfire
description: This wand carries the warlock spell witchfire.

name: Wand of the Hunting Hound
description: This plain, wooden wand has its end carved to resemble a snarling mastiff.

name: Wandering Trove
description: What seems an ordinary hill suddenly vanishes into thin air!

name: War Ring
description: This steel band, emblazoned with a stylized sword, makes your attacks even more lethal.

name: Warded Vambraces
description: These leather armbands let you share your arcane defenses with others.

name: Warding Blade
description: This silvery blade seems to move of its own accord, protecting you from harm.

name: Warding Light Armor
description: White and yellow fire plays over this armor's links. When a foe strikes you, these flames erupt in a punishing flare.

name: Warding Mind
description: Your heightened senses pick out thoughts and impulses from your foes, helping you react with speed and precision.

info.Description: These dice, cards, knucklebones, or diviner’s sticks are necessary equipment for games of chance.

name: Warding Spirit Armor
description: The primal power infused within this leather armor draws power from your spirit companion to shield you from attack when your guard is down.

name: Warlock's Bracers
description: These dark leather cuffs, etched with symbols and runes, protect you against those you' ve cursed.

name: Warmage's Uniform
description: These decorated greatcoats come in a variety of styles, but all lend military might to their wearers.

name: Warsheath Armor
description: This armor ensures that its wearer is surrounded not just by protective layers, but also by eager foes

name: Warsoul Weapon
description: When this weapon is attached, you strike with superior speed and agility.
requirement:: You must have the living construct racial trait to use this item.

name: Watcher's Horn
description: This small black horn produces no noise when sounded, but it awakens your slumbering friends and makes them ready to fight.

name: Watcher's Signet
description: This white gold ring takes the shape of a dagger that curls around the wearer's finger.

name: Watchful Eye
description: Taking the form of some lesser gem in the eye socket of an idol, or just stuck in the middle of a wall, this spy reports all that it sees back to its master.

name: Watchful Ruby Eye
description: This crimson gem set in gold and silver enhances your warding rituals.

name: Watchful Spirit Totem
description: Several animal faces seem to look out from this totem with wide eyes. Its magic, channeled through your spirit companion, lashes out at those who harm your allies.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 damage per plus against a bloodied creature.

info.Description: This marked gambling gear gives you a +2 bonus to Thievery checks to cheat while gambling.

name: Waterbane Weapon
description: Creatures of stream and sea have reason to tremble before this weapon.
weapon:: Axe, crossbow, heavy blade, light blade or  spear
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d10 damage per plus against creatures that have the aquatic or water keyword.

name: Wave of Sorrow
description: Wave of Sorrow is a massive black greatsword. The serrated blade undulates for minutes after it draws blood.

name: Wavestrider Boots
description: These enchanted boots allow you to walk across liquid as if it were solid land.

name: Weapon of Arcane Bonds
description: Effects you cause with this blade bind your enemies to you.

name: Weapon of Cruel Persuasion
description: The menacing cut of this weapon keeps your foes at bay.

name: Weapon of Evil Undone
description: The power and purity of this weapon lays into your foe and leaves it stricken on the battlefield.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus against rakshasas

name: Weapon of Great Opportunity
description: You take advantage of a foe's vulnerability to deliver a devastating strike with this weapon.

name: Weapon of Myrdroon's Shard
description: Made from a shard of Myrdroon's spear, this weapon looses devastating lightning.

name: Weapon of Oaths Fulfilled
description: As your weapon slays your deity's enemy, you feel a surge of vitality that allows you to keep fighting.

info.Description: These spike-toed footwear help you kick notches into a surface you are climbing. While wearing dagger boots, you gain +2 bonus to Athletics checks to climb but take a -2 penalty to Stealth checks to move silently.

name: Weapon of Shared Wrath
description: When you're injured, this weapon transfers your wrath to an ally, inspiring him or her to attack a foe.

name: Weapon of Summer
description: This weapon is engraved with Rellanic runes and glows like the summer sun.

name: Weapon of the Conqueror
description: This dragonborn-crafted weapon's hilt or handle is carved to resemble a dragon's head. Its magic enhances and expands the power of your dragon breath.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus if you are bloodied.

name: Whetstone of Combustion
description: Your weapon gains an oily residue when you run it across this obsidian sharpening stone.

name: Whetstone of Venom
description: This sickly green whetstone coats a weapon in toxin.

name: Whirlpool Weapon
description: This weapon trails splashing water after it as you swing it, and when you whirl it about, it creates a whirlpool to draw foes into its reach.

name: Whirlwind Weapon
description: The shaft of this polearm is so heavy and strong that you can use it to bludgeon a foe already off-balance from a hit with the blade.

name: Whispers from Beyond
description: You hear strange whispers and experience unsettling visions, yet from the confusing jumble can pick out useful insights.

name: Whistle of Warning
description: This small, unremarkable-looking silver whistle gives off a shrill noise when sounded.

name: Whistling Songbow
description: Projectiles launched from this weapon whistle as they streak toward their target.

info.Description: This kit includes a crowbar, ten iron spikes, iron manacles, a miner’s helmet, two sacks, surveyor’s gear, and a ten-foot pole. Many purchasers supplement this kit with clinging essence of fire.

name: White Kingdom Boneclaw
description: This skeletal arm ends in a sharp three-fingered claw and glows with runes of necromantic power. It affixes to your arm with leather straps.

name: White Orb of Dragonkind
description: This icy orb has the appearance of a pearl the size of a goblin's head. It has the power to control white dragons.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against white dragons.

name: Whiteflame Armor
description: This armor absorbs light and can be converted to protect against other effects.

name: Wicked Fang
description: This weapon's jagged blade seems permanently stained with the blood of those it has slain.

name: Wild Flare Dagger
description: Sparking with barely controlled wild magic, this multi-hued dagger sends unpredictable spikes of energy into your enemies.

name: Wildfire Totem
description: This charred totem grows hot to the touch as your enemy erupts in hungry flames.

name: Wildleaf Armor
description: Fashioned by elves from fallen leaves, these suits of armor are favored by rangers and rogues who patrol the wilderness.

name: Wildrunners
description: Crafted from the skins of wild plains animals, these boots lend you extraordinary speed.

name: Window of Escape
description: When you need to get out of a room in a hurry, this unremarkable window is your best escape.

info.Description: Hammering one of these blunt, wide metal wedges between a door and its frame requires a standard action and adds 5 to the DC of checks to open the door. If nothing but a spike is holding a door shut, the base DC to open it is 15. Spiking a door is noisy; each time you drive in a spike, creatures within 20 squares can make a Perception check with a +5 bonus to hear you.

name: Windsoul Ki Focus
description: This leather bag contains a dancing vortex of wind, which teaches you its secrets.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and you push the target 1 square per plus

name: Winged Armor
description: Glorious angelic wings sprout from this armor at your command.
armor:: Cloth, leather, hide, chain, plate or  scale

name: Winged Boots
description: These enchanted boots protect you from falling damage and can be activated to allow you to fly.

name: Winged Bracers
description: With these ornate bracers on your arms, you can glide safely down from great heights.

name: Winged Shield
description: This narrow silver shield has folded mithral wings extending  from each side. When released, it floats beside you and offers protection as if you wielded it yourself.

name: Winged Weapon
description: This dagger can take to the air to deliver your spells and protect you from harm.

name: Winter's Grasp Totem
description: This totem is fashioned from dry wood and white fur. It embodies the spirit of winter and a time when nature sleeps and life grows weak.

name: Winter's Heart Totem
description: Let your heart-of-pine badge warn everyone of the coming doom that shall cleanse this world.

name: Winterward Shield
description: This icy white shield with a silver rim is chill to the touch as it draws the cold to itself.

name: Winterwood Totem
description: Fashioned from trees perpetually coated in primal frost, this totem is surrounded by a cloud of freezing mist.

info.Description: When you put these shackles on a helpless or otherwise incapacitated creature, that creature is restrained until it escapes or is freed. The Acrobatics check to escape from these restraints is against a hard DC of the creature’s level.        The Strength check to break the manacles is against a DC that depends on the quality of the manacles, whether iron (DC 24) or adamantine (DC 31).

name: Withering Weapon
description: Each blow with this weapon weakens armor and resolve.

name: Wolfen Weapon
description: This blade's edge is as jagged as a fanged maw, and its steel is dull and gray.

name: Wounding Weapon
description: This weapon tears through an enemy's flesh, creating wounds that bleed profusely.
weapon:: Axe, bow, crossbow, heavy blade, light blade or  spear

name: Woundpatch
description: You slap the fleshy bandage on your ally and the patch knits with the creature's flesh to close the wound.

name: Woundstitch Powder
description: This worn leather pouch contains a quantity of life-saving yellow powder.

name: Wraith's Cord
description: You become wraithlike when you wear this worn rope band.

name: Wrestler's Gloves
description: The palms of these rough hide wraps are coated with a tacky substance that holds fast to whatever you grasp.

info.Description: Astral stalker preservation techniques yield stalkerhide.
You can attach a lantern, a sunrod, or some other lighting device to the forehead reflector of this headgear to provide hands-free illumination.

name: Wyrdwarped Weapon
description: This weapon thrums with hidden power that can teleport your enemy.

name: Wyrmguard Shield
description: This platinum-inlaid shield has the power to make serious blows much less deadly.

name: Wyrmspike
description: This wooden staff is twisted and gnarled. It is blacked as if it was once cast into a great fire. If it didn't glow with a light-blue aura, it would appear to be a worthless piece of debris.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, +1d12 per plus against dragons

name: Wyrmtooth Dagger
description: Carved from a dragon's tooth, this dagger can strip away a creature's elemental defenses.

name: Wyrmtouched Amulet
description: Shaped in the likeness of a dragon and adorned with Draconic runes, this handsome amulet is a boon to dragonborn.

name: Wyvern Venom
description: This poison is far more dangerous than that delivered by the sting of a wyvern itself, as a result of the alchemical process that produces this inky-black liquid.

name: Zaarani's Solitaire
description: The power of this golden spherical gem drives your foes to the ground.

name: Zealot's Armor
description: This armor is surrounded by motes of light that grow in intensity as undead approach the wearer.

name: Zehir's Gloves
description: These black gloves bolster your powers to bypass your enemy's most potent defenses.

name: Zephyr Boots
description: You catch the wind and fly like bird with these light boots.

info.Description: You can carry up to 100 pounds in one of these leather or canvas drawstring bags.

name: Zephyr Horseshoes
description: These black iron horseshoes allow a mount to race across all kinds of terrain.

name: Bag of Tricks, RustConjured Beast (Rust Bag)
description: : When you use a bag of tricks to conjure a creature, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 squares of you; the space must be large enough to contain the creature without squeezing. The creature obeys only you, responding to commands spoken in any language. The creature remains until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. The conjured creature acts on the same initiative count as you. Every action it takes costs you a minor action (which you use to issue commands), and a conjured creature cannot exceed its normal allotment of actions (a standard, a move, and a minor action) during its turn. If you spend no minor actions on your turn to command the creature, it remains where it is without taking any actions on its turn.          A conjured creature is a minion. It has no healing surges and cannot be healed, and it cannot gain temporary hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, the conjured creature disappears.          If an object is placed in the bag of tricks, the bag ceases to function until the object is removed. A bag of tricks used for simple storage holds up to 3 pounds.

name: Bag of Tricks, VermilionConjured Beast (Vermilion Bag)
description: : When you use a bag of tricks to conjure a creature, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 squares of you; the space must be large enough to contain the creature without squeezing. The creature obeys only you, responding to commands spoken in any language. The creature remains until the end of the encounter or for 5 minutes. The conjured creature acts on the same initiative count as you. Every action it takes costs you a minor action (which you use to issue commands), and a conjured creature cannot exceed its normal allotment of actions (a standard, a move, and a minor action) during its turn. If you spend no minor actions on your turn to command the creature, it remains where it is without taking any actions on its turn.          A conjured creature is a minion. It has no healing surges and cannot be healed, and it cannot gain temporary hit points. When reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, the conjured creature disappears.          If an object is placed in the bag of tricks, the bag ceases to function until the object is removed. A bag of tricks used for simple storage holds up to 3 pounds.

name: Gem of Valor
description: This brilliant sapphire promises great rewards to the bold.

name: Vagabond's Die
description: This die is well used—the images on its faces are almost worn away.

name: Armor of Dogged Grit
description: While in this armor, you continue to fight on with grim determination, even though you absorb blows that would fell most combatants.

name: Armor of Escape
description: Thanks to this armor, you shrug off shackles and bindings as easily as you would remove a pair of breeches.

name: Armor of Scintillating Colors
description: The majesty imbued upon you by this vibrant armor compels enemies in your presence to stand down.

name: Armor of the Charging Wind
description: This elegantly crafted armor allows you to rush unseen across the battlefield, moving like the wind.

info.Description: With this plumb line, measuring chain with pins, and slate for recording notes, you gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks to search for secret doors or hidden rooms, but using the gear takes at least 5 minutes.

name: Blending Armor
description: When you move, this armor erupts into swirling colors whose palette is taken from the surrounding environment, obscuring your exact position.

name: Blessed Armor of Kord
description: Charged with divine power, this armor lets you unleash Kord’s mighty wrath on enemies who dare attack you.

name: Doppelganger Armor
description: As you focus on a nearby enemy, this armor flares with magical energy, changing itself to match the defenses of your foe.

name: Ebon Armor
description: This black armor’s breastplate is detailed with small skulls at its joints and breastplate, as if it had been crafted for an undead warrior.

name: Fishscale Armor
description: While wearing this armor, you slide through the water like a great fish.

name: Gloaming Armor
description: You fade from view even as the noise of your footfalls recedes.

name: Greater Armor of Eyes
description: While you wear this armor, your visual senses expand in every direction, enabling you to avoid unseen attacks.

name: Hide of Worms
description: You press your body to the ground and pass freely into it, burrowing through the dirt easily.

name: Plate Mail of Etherealness
description: You surprise your enemies by using this armor to move through a hindering obstacle to get behind them.

name: Robe of the Archmage
description: You can tap this robe’s power to broaden your magical ability, but at a cost, since your body acts as a conduit for that force.

info.Description: Prodding dangerous-looking things with a ten-foot pole lets you trigger many traps from the safety of 2 squares away.

name: Robe of Useful Items
description: No matter what simple item you need, you can find it in one of this robe’s many pockets.

name: Shallow Grave Armor
description: This suit of armor is covered with dirt and grime. No amount of scrubbing can remove it.

name: Wintersnap Armor
description: This strange white armor absorbs cold winds before they find your flesh, storing the bite of the frigid air so you can bring it forth when the time is right.

name: Captain's Weapon
description: You brandish your weapon and give battle commands to your nearby comrades, who take heart knowing your side will win the day.

name: Flame Tongue Weapon
description: This blade spews forth flames that engulf your enemies in fire.

name: Frost Brand Weapon
description: Frost forms on your hands as you alter your grip on this icy weapon, but the cold doesn’t harm you as the weapon devours all the heat around you.

name: Giantslayer Weapon
description: This weapon seeks out giantkind, helping you deliver vicious strikes against those foes.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus against Large or larger humanoids

name: Greater Dancing Weapon
description: This weapon leaps from your grasp, then darts and weaves through the air toward your enemies.

name: Greater Luckblade
description: Feeling a vibration in this weapon, you spin aside. A second later, a foe’s strike splits the air where your head just was.

name: Weapon of Storms
description: When you wield this weapon, the power of the storm rages around you, blasting your enemies with thunder and lightning.

info.Description: This kit includes two candle clocks, chalk and slate, chirurgeon’s tools, a doctrinal book, and regalia. Many purchasers supplement this kit with holy water.

name: Lesser Cloaked Weapon
description: Seemingly unarmed as your foe approaches, you reach behind your back. Suddenly, this weapon appears in your hands, tilting the odds in your favor.

name: Lifestealer Weapon
description: When you strike your enemy, a small measure of your foe’s life force is absorbed by this weapon and directed into you.

name: Weapon of Disruption
description: This iron mace is scribed with a variety of holy runes. It glimmers with white light as divine magic flows through it.

name: Weapon of the Titans
description: No opposition can stand against you while you wield this mighty hammer, whether living foe or inanimate edifice.

name: Mighty Dwarven Thrower
description: Thunder peals as you hurl this hammer through the air on a collision course with your enemy’s skull.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus against Large or larger humanoids

name: Punishing Weapon
description: After you strike your foe with this weapon, your enemy appears mote vulnerable as its will to stand up to you drains away.

name: Seeker Weapon
description: The ammunition fired from this weapon weaves and changes its trajectory, snaking around obstacles to strike true.

name: Shock Weapon
description: You hold the spear aloft and stand fast before your enemies as it throws out bolts of lightning that leave those foes reeling.

name: Stinging Weapon
description: Even before you strike your foe, you can feel this weapon’s tip edging up and down and back and forth, seeking the weak point in your enemy’s defenses.

name: True Dragonslayer Weapon
description: You strike at a dragon, feeling this weapon thrum in anticipation as the blow sends the dragon reeling.
critical:: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d12 damage per plus against dragons

info.Description: Lighting one of these wax tapers allows you to count hours by observing how far the candle has burned down against marks made in the wax. Each clock lasts for 8 hours and is consumed after use. Candle clocks are typically sold in pairs to help synchronize timing between separate groups.

name: Warning Weapon
description: While you hold this weapon, every nearby enemy is known to you, standing out like a shining beacon no matter its stealth or enchantment.

name: Way-Leader Weapon
description: You strike your foe, designating it as prey for your allies even as you teleport them next to the surprised enemy.

name: Weapon of Defense
description: Each of your enemy’s blows finds ready opposition in this parrying weapon.

name: Weapon of Submission
description: Your enemy flinches and cowers, allowing itself to be thrown around when you strike it with this weapon.

name: Weapon of Surrounding
description: When you strike with this weapon, you blink out of sight, then instantly reappear on the other side of your foe.

name: Weapon of Long Range
description: Though your allies can barely see your enemies approaching, your attacks with this weapon are already finding their targets.

name: Weapon of Speed
description: Even before your first attack with this weapon hits its mark, you follow it up with another one.

name: Wind Weapon
description: You twist this weapon just so as your strike, calling forth gusts of wind to toss your enemies about.

name: Armor-Sapping Ammunition
description: When this arrow strikes, your foe’s armor appears to fade away.

info.Description: Use chalk to write on dungeon walls to help find your way back out or to leave messages for those who follow. Drawing on a slate lets you communicate simple ideas when you need to remain silent or work around a language barrier.

name: Firesight Ammunition
description: When this bolt strikes its target, the shaft explodes in a burst of white, illuminating specks that cover your foe.

name: Foe-Seeker Ammunition
description: This arrow creates a magical link between you and your enemies, making each of your shots more accurate than the last until you strike home.

name: Reaving Ammunition
description: When this arrow finds its target, it burrows deep, causing great pain.

name: Shadowshaft Ammunition
description: A dark haze trails behind this arrow as you fire it, exploding in a burst of clinging shadow upon impact.

name: Shiver-Strike Ammunition
description: When it strikes, this bolt splits, spraying nearby creatures with shards of steel.

name: Stonehold Ammunition
description: A shroud of stone fragments erupts from this bolt when it hits, holding your foe in place.

name: Candle of Invocation
description: The radiance of this holy symbol both lights your way and helps you overcome the challenges that block the path.

name: Necklace of Prayer Beads
description: The beads that hang from this necklace glow with divine power that you can call upon to overcome any challenge.

name: Phylactery of Faithfulness
description: You attune yourself to this symbol of your god and gain insight into your deity’s will.

name: Symbol of the Sun
description: Crafted from polished gold, this holy symbol intensifies and reflects light like a mirror.

info.Description: This surgical gear includes brass wedges that can be heated to cauterize wounds and jars of leeches for bleeding patients. When you use these tools to treat an ally who has contracted a disease caused by an attack from a creature, that ally gains a +2 bonus to the next check he or she makes against the disease.

name: Body of Fire Ki Focus
description: This oil fuels a fire within you that might smolder or might blaze forth, but will never be extinguished.

name: Steadfast Stone Ki Focus
description: This plain, round stone reveals the secrets of strength and tenacity, allowing you to mimic its impervious nature.

name: Tidal Wave Ki Focus
description: You hit an enemy and concentrate on this ki focus, sending that foe staggering backward to the ground.

name: Orb of Enduring Magic
description: Carved from iron to resemble a clenched gauntlet, this orb allows you to extend your magical abilities while absorbing your foes’ attacks.

name: Orb of Forceful Magic
description: This transparent orb shimmers and glows with golden energy that you can channel to hurl your enemies about.

name: Orb of Relentless Sympathy
description: This orb empathically links you and your allies’ physical senses to your enemy’s mind, causing it to feel your pain when it harms you.

name: Prismatic Orb
description: Each of the spectral colors flickering on the surface of this orb is a shell of energy that can engulf a foe.

name: Stone of Good Luck
description: This orb, typically made from rough polished agate, grants its wielder control over the ups and downs of fortune.

name: Rod of Absorption
description: This rod is prized for its power to negate all forms of energy.

name: Rod of Beguiling
description: This rod displays the trappings of wealth and status, persuading your foes to see you as one of their own.

info.Description: Each of these volumes holds lore pertaining to a certain deity. After a failed Religion check associated with this deity or its followers, you can attempt the check again after spending 1 hour studying the doctrinal book. You must use the second result.

name: Rod of Death
description: Wielding this rod lets you cheat death to harm your foes more quickly.

name: Rod of Revenge
description: This rod resembles a short spear carved from black wood. With it, you can gain the upper hand against any foe that dares to attack you.

name: Rod of Smiting
description: The head of this rods flares outward like a mace. It weighs heavily in your hand, allowing you to make heavy strikes with it like a weapon.

name: Greater Staff of Power
description: Covered in eldritch runes, this staff exudes raw magical might that you can harness for your defense or to attack your foes.

name: Staff of Command
description: This staff is a useful tool for imposing your will on others.

name: Staff of Striking
description: Fashioned of unadorned metal in a symmetrical and severe design, this staff delivers forceful blows to your enemies.

name: Staff of the Viper
description: The head of this wooden staff animates when you lash out at a foe, delivering a poisonous wound.

name: Staff of Withering
description: This staff appears to be little more than a rotting tree branch, but one touch of it saps the strength from any foe.

name: Emerald Tome of the Devourer
description: This green tome’s cover and pages have a strange metallic feel. An eldritch yellow sigil marks its cover and emanates a sense of foreboding.

name: Manual of Expansive Learning
description: This tome expands your ability to prepare and use spells.

name: Manual of Puissant Skill
description: This tome contains lore to improve your performance by training your mind and body.

name: Tome of Undeniable Might
description: This plain, leather-bound tome appears to be a simple treatise on arcane magic, but at your touch, it gives your powers the ability to affect creatures not of the world.

name: Totem of Thorns
description: This totem is carved from a briar vines with their thorns left intact, so that it cannot be gripped without drawing blood.
critical:: +1d6 psychic damage per plus, or +1d10 psychic damage per plus if you are bloodied

name: Totem of Trailblazing
description: This simple stone has the faded image of a campsite painted upon it.

name: Totem of the Woodlands
description: This carved wooden totem lets you call forth the power of the forest to block and restrain your enemies.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is slowed (save ends).

name: Apprentice's Wand
description: This simple length of wood appears in your hand when you need it most.

name: Wand of Conjuring
description: This metal wand is covered in silvery runes that glow with arcane might. Here and there, strands and crystals seem to exude from it.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus when used with a conjuration attack

name: Wand of Fear
description: The only thing more unnerving than holding this pale wand is experiencing its horrific effects.

name: Wand of Fire
description: Thin wisps of smoke curl from the surface of this pyrotechnic wand.

name: Wand of Frost
description: Snow drifts to the ground in the wake of this wand’s silvery ray, as it freezes the air it passes through before striking your enemy.

info.Description: Voidhide armor comes from similar methods used by the sorrowsworn to preserve their grisly trophies.

name: Wand of Inevitability
description: This wand, crafted from light, supple wood, allows you to accurately strike your enemies with a flick of the wrist.

name: Wand of Lightning
description: Whenever you use this wand to send arcs of lightning among your foes, the smell of ozone fills the air and your hair stands up on end.

name: Wand of Thunder
description: This brass wand, which resembles a miniaturized horn, will drive your enemies back with a wave of thunder, or drop them with a shock wave.

name: Wand of Wonder
description: Few can call on the powers of this wand without a mingled sense of amazement and dread.
critical:: +1d6 damage per plus. For each of these dice that rolls a 6, teleport the target 1 square. For each of these dice that rolls a 1, teleport yourself 1 square.

name: Gleaming Diamond Bracers
description: These clear crystal bracers blaze with light as you shrug off your foe’s attack.

name: Greater Stonewall Shield
description: At your command, this stone shield becomes a solid wall that hems in your foes.

name: Greater Storm Shield
description: When a foe dares to attack you, you summon the power of the storm through this shield to smite your enemy.

name: Ranging Defender Shield
description: You protect a comrade in danger by extending this shield’s magical defenses to that ally.

name: Searing Shield
description: You send a wave of brilliant light outward from this shield to illuminate the darkness.

name: Shield of Aversion
description: Even as your foe closes in to attack, you see its eyes cloud with uncertainty.

info.Description: When you put these shackles on a helpless or otherwise incapacitated creature, that creature is restrained until it escapes or is freed. The Acrobatics check to escape from these restraints is against a hard DC of the creature’s level.        The Strength check to break the manacles is against a DC that depends on the quality of the manacles, whether iron (DC 24) or adamantine (DC 31).

name: Shield of the Doomed
description: Thanks to the protective magic of this shield, you shrug off a fatal blow, giving you time to put your foe down.

name: Tusk Shield
description: With this shield on your arm, your deadly charge shatters your enemies’ attacks.

name: Twilight Shield
description: This shield looks like a polished black pane of glass set in a sturdy metal frame.

name: Vanguard's Shield
description: When an enemy charges, this steel shield hinders the attack.

name: Boots of Elvenkind
description: You pass without notice, leaving neither footprint nor echo.

name: Boots of Leaping
description: Empowered by these boots, you fling yourself into the air, clearing your foes and landing behind them.

name: Boots of Levitation
description: You rise into the air thanks to these soft leather boots, able to see and be seen across a broader area.

name: Boots of the Shadowed Path
description: These leather boots are utterly black and seem to absorb light.

name: Halfling Boots
description: These boots look like they are sized for a child, but when you attempt to pull them on, they grow just large enough to fit you. Still, they feel tight around your feet.

name: Shoes of the Tireless Gait
description: While you stay in motion, these shoes keep your body fresh for the challenges ahead.

info.Description: This kit includes a bestiary, a hidden item compartment, investigation gear, iron filings and lodestone, a jar of glowworms, and a writing case. Many purchasers supplement this kit with tracking dust.

name: Shoes of Water Walking
description: While in these shoes, you tread across water as if it were land.

name: Gauntlets of Remote Action
description: You send one of these gauntlets into the air, where it waits for you to control its actions from a safe distance.

name: Gloves of Missile Snaring
description: Your gloved hand moves in a blur, plucking your foe’s arrow out of midair before you hurl it back as a deadly missile.

name: Life-Draining Gauntlets
description: The dead flesh of these grisly gauntlets draws strength from your enemies.

name: True Gauntlets of Ogre Power
description: When the brutal strength of the ogre courses through you, nothing can stand in your way.

name: Exceptional Factotum Helm
description: The knowledge stored within this silver helm is imparted to you when you need it most.

name: Eyes of Charming
description: These silver spectacles let you either assert subtle influence on others, or force them to do your bidding.

name: Eyes of the Eagle
description: After an initial surge of vertigo, these magic lenses, which rest unseen on your eyes, bring the farthest objects into sharp relief.

name: Helm of Brilliance
description: The gems of this helm flare in a corona of brilliant light as you prepare to unleash their power.

name: Helm of Languages
description: When you slip on this helm, the haze of garbled voices around you quickly gives way to perfect understanding.

info.Description: Each of these books offers lore about a single combination of creature origin and type, such as fey humanoids. When you fail a monster knowledge check related to a creature with this origin and type, you can reroll the check by spending one hour studying the bestiary. You must use the second result.

name: Helm of Seven Deaths
description: This black helm has seven green gems set above its brow. They are dull, dead things, as if they once held magical power that has long since been spent.

name: Helm of Teleportation
description: This headwear makes you preternaturally aware of the space around you, allowing you to step to other nearby locations in the blink of an eye.

name: Ioun Stone of Might
description: This pale blue rhomboid augments your physical strength.

name: Ioun Stone of Agility
description: This deep red sphere increases your reaction time and quickness.

name: Ioun Stone of Vigor
description: This pink rhomboid lends its magic to your bodily health.

name: Ioun Stone of Intellect
description: This scarlet and blue sphere sharpens the power of your mind.

name: Ioun Stone of Insight
description: This iridescent blue sphere hones your instincts to a fine edge.

name: Ioun Stone of Allure
description: This pink and green sphere increases your presence and force of personality.

name: Amulet of Life Protection
description: Each time you take damage to body or mind, this amulet pulses warmly, reminding you of the protection it holds for you, even in death.

name: Brooch of Unerring Defense
description: This clasp flares with white light each time you shrug off an otherwise unavoidable strike.

info.Description: While wearing this cunningly crafted piece of apparel, you can conceal an object on yourself that weighs 1 pound or less. You gain a +2 bonus to Stealth checks against Perception checks to notice the item.

name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
description: When you enter the water, this cloak enfolds you, with its edges acting like the powerful wings of a fast-moving ray.

name: Cloak of the Stalking Shadow
description: This flimsy, black cloak is cool to the touch. In your hands it flows and shifts, as if it were a liquid barely being held in solid form.

name: Greater Medallion of the Mind
description: The medallion’s gem glows softly as your thoughts take root in the minds of those around you.

name: Greater Necklace of Fireballs
description: The globes of this necklace are warm to the touch, hinting at the deadly fire they can unleash upon your foes.

name: Greater Talisman of Repulsion
description: When an enemy strikes you, you release a pulse of magical force from this amulet that drives your foe back.

name: Lesser Badge of the Berserker
description: The jagged bone of this macabre badge digs into your flesh as you race into battle, the pain inspiring you to greater fury.

name: Periapt of Health
description: This charm gives off a sweet scent that only you can detect, masking any odor of noxiousness or corruption.

name: Scarab of Insanity
description: When an enemy dares attack your mind, you lash out with the power of this red-and-black scarab, driving a spike of madness into your foe’s mind.

name: Sneak's Cloak
description: As you wrap this voluminous cloak around you, its magic conceals your presence from your enemies.

name: Incendiary Ring of Fireblazing
description: A shroud of living flame emanates from this ring without harming you. On your command, you can send it blazing outward to sear your enemies.

info.Description: This bag of equipment includes containers made from different materials, brushes, dusts, tweezers, picks, probes, a magnifying glass, ink and quills, parchment, and a small journal. You gain a +2 bonus to Perception checks when you use the kit to search an area for specific details.

name: Lesser Ring of Feather Fall
description: You barely notice the weight of this delicately filigreed metal band, but you appreciate the lightness it confers to you whenever you take a fall.

name: Ring of Borrowed Spells
description: This band of rune-carved ebony holds arcane power in reserve for you to call upon in time of need.

name: Ring of Humanoid Influence
description: A dark self-confidence fills you as you slip on this ring, emboldening you to manipulate the feelings of others.

name: Ring of Resourceful Wizardry
description: You feel the fullness of your arcane potential while you wear this ring.

name: Ring of X-ray Vision
description: With this crystal ring on, your surroundings come into greater focus. With concentration, you can even see through solid objects.

name: Belt of Dwarvenkind
description: The delicate metalwork in this belt is unmistakably magical, as is the feeling that courses through you when you lash it on.

name: Backpack of Concealment
description: This plain leather backpack is covered with pockets big and small.

name: Broom of Flying
description: This gnarled wicker broom seems to constantly tug at the hand that holds it, seeking to take to the air.

name: Climber's Rope
description: When a slope or wall cannot be climbed, this projectile creates an easier path.

name: Crystal Ball
description: The vestiges of past, present, and future swirl within this gleaming crystal orb when you view it.

info.Description: Watching for disruptions in the patterns that iron filings normally form around a lodestone can help you perceive strong magical forces. When you fail an Arcana check to detect magic on an object or a location, you can attempt the check again after spending 1 hour spreading and studying the iron filings. You must use the second result.

name: Daern's Instant Fortress
description: With a touch, you transform this iron cube into a fortress that protects yourself and your friends.

name: Decanter of Endless Water
description: When you open this always-dripping flask, it will release a steady stream of water, or a torrent that blasts away obstacles.

name: Elven Chain Shirt
description: This fine mesh of mithral links is no more burdensome than a cotton shirt, yet is stronger than steel.

name: Flask of the Veiled HordeVeiled Horde Shadow
description: This flask is wrought from a black metal of unknown origin. It is cold to the touch, and shaking reveals that it is filled with a heavy liquid. A stopper of the same black metal seals it shut.

name: Gem of Seeing
description: With this translucent stone held to your eye, all things become tantalizingly clear to you.

name: Greater Flying Carpet
description: When you unroll this intricately stitched carpet, it floats just above the ground, rippling as if blown by a powerful wind.

name: Greater Horn of Blasting
description: Even as you raise it to your lips, this horn begins to shudder in anticipation of the deadly fury it will unleash.

name: Guardian's Whistle
description: This tin whistle is covered with runes that look like they have been crudely scratched into its surface.

name: Iron Bands of Bilarro
description: This rusty iron sphere has a series of shallow grooves that trace concentric circles across its surface.

name: Mountebank's Deck
description: This plain deck of cards looks crisp and new, suggesting that you are likewise new at the game.

info.Description: The tiny insects in the jar create dim light in the jar’s square.
